ambrosia.refund: Se han reembolsado todos los Arándanos y Ambrosía gastados.

ambrosia.notUnlocked: Clear No Golden Quark Upgrades, Tier 1!

ambrosiaTutorial.name: Módulo Tutorial de Ambrosia
ambrosiaTutorial.description: Blueberries generate Ambrosia over time. Spend them in the Ambrosia tree! +5% Cubes per level, +1% Quarks per level
ambrosiaTutorial.effect: This tutorial module increases Cube gain by {{cubeAmount}}% and Quarks by {{quarkAmount}}%

ambrosiaQuarks1.name: Ambrosia Quark Module I
ambrosiaQuarks1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxed to buy levels of this. +1% Quarks per level.
ambrosiaQuarks1.effect: This Quark module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes1.name: Módulo de Cubos de Ambrosia I
ambrosiaCubes1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxxed to buy levels of this. +5% Cubes per level. Every 5 levels give 1.1x Cubes.
ambrosiaCubes1.effect: This Cube module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuck1.name: Módulo de Suerte de Ambrosia I
ambrosiaLuck1.description: Congrats on completing the Tutorial module. You need to have it maxxed to buy levels of this. +2 Ambrosia Luck per lvl. Every 10 levels give +12 more!
ambrosiaLuck1.effect: This luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaCubeQuark1.name: Ambrosia Cube-Quark Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaCubeQuark1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.01% Quarks per level per digit in the values of all cube types.
ambrosiaCubeQuark1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuckQuark1.name: Ambrosia Luck-Quark Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaLuckQuark1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.01% more Quarks per level per 1 Ambrosia Luck! Diminishing returns after 1,000 Luck.
ambrosiaLuckQuark1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaQuarkCube1.name: Ambrosia Quark-Cube Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaQuarkCube1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.1% more Cubes per level per digit in your Quark balance, squared!
ambrosiaQuarkCube1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuckCube1.name: Ambrosia Luck-Cube Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaLuckCube1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.05% more Cubes per level per 1 Ambrosia Luck!
ambrosiaLuckCube1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubeLuck1.name: Ambrosia Cube-Luck Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaCubeLuck1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.02 Ambrosia Luck per level per digit in the values of all cube types.
ambrosiaCubeLuck1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.name: Ambrosia Quark-Luck Hybrid Module I
ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.description: A first generation hybrid module. Gain +0.02 Ambrosia Luck per level per digit in your Quark balance, squared.
ambrosiaQuarkLuck1.effect: This first generation hybrid module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaQuarks2.name: Ambrosia Quark Module II
ambrosiaQuarks2.description: Self-Synergies! Gain +1% Quarks per level, +0.1% for every 10 levels in Ambrosia Quark Module I.
ambrosiaQuarks2.effect: This second generation Quark module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes2.name: Ambrosia Cube Module II
ambrosiaCubes2.description: Self-Synergies! Gain +10% cubes per level, +1% for every 10 levels in Ambrosia Cube Module I. Every 5 levels give 1.15x Cubes.
ambrosiaCubes2.effect: This second generation Cube module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuck2.name: Ambrosia Luck Module II
ambrosiaLuck2.description: Self-Synergies! Gain +3 Ambrosia Luck per level, +0.3 for every 10 levels in Ambrosia Luck Module I. Every 10 levels give +40 more!
ambrosiaLuck2.effect: This second generation Luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaQuarks3.name: Ambrosia Quark Module III
ambrosiaQuarks3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +5% Quarks per level, and the effect is 1% stronger per level of Ambrosia Quark Module II.
ambrosiaQuarks3.effect: This third generation Quark module increases Quark gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaCubes3.name: Ambrosia Cube Module III
ambrosiaCubes3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +20% Cubes per level, and the effect is 3% stronger per level of Ambrosia Cube Module II. Every 5 levels give 1.2x Cubes.
ambrosiaCubes3.effect: This third generation Cube module increases Cube gain by {{amount}}%

ambrosiaLuck3.name: Ambrosia Luck Module III
ambrosiaLuck3.description: A darkness emboldens this module. +1 Ambrosia Luck per level, and the effect is multiplied by the total number of Blueberries you own!
ambrosiaLuck3.effect: This third generation Luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaLuck4.name: The Eight Leaf Clover
ambrosiaLuck4.description: My magical lucky charms! +0.01% Ambrosia Luck per level, multiplied by the number of total digits in your Lifetime Ambrosia and Red Ambrosia!
ambrosiaLuck4.effect: This fourth generation Luck module increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}

ambrosiaPatreon.name: Shameless, Ambrosial Patreon Reminder
ambrosiaPatreon.description: In every realm, Platonic sells out. The Patreon bonus will also impact your Ambrosia Bar Point generation.
ambrosiaPatreon.effect: Generous Patreon supporters grant you {{amount}}% more Ambrosia Bar Points. If you are not already, consider buying PseudoCoins to support development!

ambrosiaObtainium1.name: RNG-based Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaObtainium1.effect: This module increases Obtainium gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaOffering1.name: RNG-based Offerings Booster
ambrosiaOffering1.effect: This module increases Offerings gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaHyperflux.name: Hyperfluxed Wow! Cube Industrial Production
ambrosiaHyperflux.description: Gain +1% (3-7D) Cubes per level, per level of Platonic Upgrade 4x4 purchased (multiplicative!!!)
ambrosiaHyperflux.effect: This module increases Cubes gain by {{amount}}%!

ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.name: Basic Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.description: +1 Base Obtainium per level! Exceed the possibilities of your strength.
ambrosiaBaseObtainium1.effect: This module increases Base Obtainium by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseOffering1.name: Basic Offerings Booster
ambrosiaBaseOffering1.description: +1 Base Offerings per level! Exceed the possibilities of your strength.
ambrosiaBaseOffering1.effect: This module increases Base Offerings by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.name: Based Obtainium Booster
ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.description: +1 Base Obtainium per level! Channel your inner er.
ambrosiaBaseObtainium2.effect: This module increases Base Obtainium by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaBaseOffering2.name: Based Offerings Booster
ambrosiaBaseOffering2.description: +1 Base Offerings per level! Channel your... I got nothing.
ambrosiaBaseOffering2.effect: This module increases Base Offerings by {{amount}}!

ambrosiaSingReduction1.name: Singularity Stabilizer Module
ambrosiaSingReduction1.description: Retrofitted with Amber flux capacitors, your Singularities are a bit smoother. Singularity Penalties are delayed by 1 singularity per level, if you are NOT! in an EXALT.
ambrosiaSingReduction1.effect: Singularity Penalties are as if you were {{amount}} Singularities lower.

ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.name: Indigo Infinity Shop Voucher
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on an indigo tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades1.effect: You own {{amount}} Indigo Infinity Shop Vouchers!

ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.name: Violet Infinity Shop Voucher
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a violet tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
ambrosiaInfiniteShopUpgrades2.effect: You own {{amount}} Violet Infinity Shop Vouchers!

ambrosiaSingReduction2.name: Exo-Chromatic Kinetic Post-Modulated Singularity Stabilizer Module
ambrosiaSingReduction2.description: Retrofitted with... those kinds of Stabilizers, your EXALTED Singularities are a bit smoother. Singularity Penalties are delayed by 1 singularity, if you are ACTUALLY! in an EXALT.
ambrosiaSingReduction2.effect: Singularity Penalties are as if you were {{amount}} Singularities lower.

ambrosiaTalismanBonusRuneLevel.name: Talisman Ambrosia Embedding Module
ambrosiaTalismanBonusRuneLevel.description: With the power of a lot of Ambrosia, grant +0.5% Talisman Power per level! Additive with other bonuses.

ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.name: Rune Coefficient Module
ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.description: For each of the first five runes, add 1 to their Rune Coefficient per level! For Infinite Ascent, add +0.001 to the Rune Coefficient per level.
ambrosiaRuneOOMBonus.effect: Runes 1-5 have +{{amount}} Rune Coefficient; IA Rune has +{{amount2}} Rune Coefficient

redAmbrosia.purchaseWarning: <<gold | ⚠>> Unlike Blueberry Modules, you <<red | CANNOT>> refund this upgrade.
redAmbrosia.perGen: Currently gaining <<red|{{guaranteed}}>> Red Ambrosia with a <<red|{{extraChance}}%>> chance of another. [<<red|Luck: {{ambrosiaLuck}}>>]
redAmbrosia.redAmbrosiaBuyPrompt: How many Red Ambrosia would you like to spend? You have {{amount}} Red Ambrosia. Type -1 to use max!
redAmbrosia.redAmbrosiaCost: Cost for next level: <<red | {{amount}}>> Red Ambrosia

tutorial.name: A beginners guide to Red Ambrosia
tutorial.description: Much like Ambrosia is the life force of the Gods, Red Ambrosia is the life force of your soul. But you don't really care about that... 1.01x Cubes, Obtainium and Offerings per level!
tutorial.effect: Cubes, Obtainium and Offerings are increased by {{amount}}!

conversionImprovement1.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement
conversionImprovement1.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement1.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

conversionImprovement2.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement II: The Red Electric Boogaloo
conversionImprovement2.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement2.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

conversionImprovement3.name: Ambrosia Luck Converter Improvement III and a half
conversionImprovement3.description: Every 20 Ambrosia luck converts to 1 Red Luck? Nah. Let's lower that ratio by 1 per level.
conversionImprovement3.effect: Reduces the number of Ambrosia Luck needed by <<crimson | {{amount}}>>!

freeTutorialLevels.name: More Blueberry Tutorial Module Levels!
freeTutorialLevels.description: A meta-tutorial of sorts. A powerful ability of Red Ambrosia is to power your Blueberry tree! Increase the effective level of Blueberry Tutorial Module by 1 per level.
freeTutorialLevels.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of Blueberry Tutorial Module by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow2.name: More Row 2 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow2.description: With the exception of the Singularity Stabilizer, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the second row, per level.
freeLevelsRow2.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of (most) row 2 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow3.name: More Row 3 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow3.description: With no exceptions, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the third row, per level.
freeLevelsRow3.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of ALL row 3 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow4.name: More Row 4 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow4.description: With no exceptions, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the fourth row, per level.
freeLevelsRow4.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of ALL row 4 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

freeLevelsRow5.name: More Row 5 Blueberry Upgrade Levels!
freeLevelsRow5.description: With the exception of the Singularity Stabilizer, add one effective level to all Blueberry Modules that reside on the fifth row, per level.
freeLevelsRow5.effect: This upgrade increases the effective level of (most) row 5 Blueberry Modules by {{amount}}!

blueberryGenerationSpeed.name: The Sands of Time
blueberryGenerationSpeed.description: +0.2% Ambrosia Bar Point gain per level. They say this hourglass has the benediction of Chronos himself.
blueberryGenerationSpeed.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

regularLuck.name: Ossified Blueberry Tactics
regularLuck.description: Most strange. Adding this gold-colored wax on your blueberries makes you slightly more likely to get Ambrosia! +2 Ambrosia Luck per level.
regularLuck.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}!

redGenerationSpeed.name: Millennium-Aged Red Ambrosia
redGenerationSpeed.description: Surely, with how long this Ambrosia is left to sit, it knows something about time. +0.3% more Red Bar Points per level.
redGenerationSpeed.effect: This upgrade increases Red Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

redLuck.name: The Dice that Decide Your Fate
redLuck.description: A life on every face, until you're finally left with an eight. +1 Red Luck per level!
redLuck.effect: This upgrade increases Red Luck by {{amount}}!

redAmbrosiaCube.name: Cubes "made" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaCube.description: Hey, Ambrosia gives cubes! Why not Red Ambrosia as well?
redAmbrosiaCube.effect: If purchased, multiply your cubes by 1 + (Lifetime)^{{exponent}} / 100.

redAmbrosiaObtainium.name: Obtainium ""made"" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaObtainium.description: I don't know why you can make a blue object from a red object. But you can.
redAmbrosiaObtainium.effect: If purchased, multiply your Obtainium by 1 + (Lifetime)^0.6 / 100.

redAmbrosiaOffering.name: Offerings """made""" of Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaOffering.description: Wait, this one kinda makes sense.
redAmbrosiaOffering.effect: If purchased, multiply your Offerings by 1 + (Lifetime)^0.6 / 100.

redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.name: Hire Red Ambrosia Artisans
redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.description: They are better at making cubes out of Red Ambrosia for you, depending on how many you have. +0.01 exponent to "Cubes 'made' of Red Ambrosia" per level.
redAmbrosiaCubeImprover.effect: Exponent for that Red Ambrosia Upgrade: 0.40 → {{newExponent}}

viscount.name: Viscount of Ruby Guy
viscount.description: For a stupid amount of Red Ambrosia, obtain a small amount of land, becoming 'viscount' of this land. Purchase this to get +10% Quarks, +125 Ambrosia Luck, +25 Red Luck, and a Discord Role!

infiniteShopUpgrades.name: Red Infinity Shop Voucher
infiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a red tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
infiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{amount}} Red Infinity Shop Vouchers!

redAmbrosiaAccelerator.name: Red-Blue Ultrafusion
redAmbrosiaAccelerator.description: When you gain a Red Ambrosia, you gain a bit of progress toward regular Ambrosia! +0.02 real-life seconds of Ambrosia Bar Points per level, per Red Ambrosia generated, with the first level giving +1!
redAmbrosiaAccelerator.effect: Each Red Ambrosia generated grants {{amount}} real-life seconds of Ambrosia Bar Points.

regularLuck2.name: Ossified Blueberry Tactics II
regularLuck2.description: This also gives +2 Ambrosia Luck / level, but you can purchase a ton of levels of this!
regularLuck2.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Luck by {{amount}}!

blueberryGenerationSpeed2.name: The Sands of Time II
blueberryGenerationSpeed2.description: This gives +0.1% Ambrosia Bar Point gain per level, but you can purchase a ton of levels of this!
blueberryGenerationSpeed2.effect: This upgrade increases Ambrosia Bar Point gain by {{amount}}!

salvageYinYang.name: Yin and Yang: Salvage Edition
salvageYinYang.description: This upgrade, oddly enough, increases both your Positive and Negative Salvage by 10 per level! <<orange|Disabled in 'Taxman's last stand'>>
salvageYinYang.effect: Your Positive and Negative Salvage are both increased by {{amount}}.

rewardTypes.title: Achievement-specific bonuses grant you the following!

salvage.name: Salvage
salvage.description: Gain +1 Salvage per Synergism level! This increases by 1 per 100 levels (e.g. gain +2 at level 101).

quarks.name: Quark Multiplier
quarks.description: Every 20 Synergism levels, multiply your Quark gain by 1.01(!)

offerings.name: Offerings Multiplier
offerings.description: Every level, gain 1.01x Offerings. After level 100, multiply it by another 1.02 per level!

obtainium.name: Obtainium Multiplier
obtainium.description: For each level past 14, multiply your Obtainium gain by 1.01. After level 100, multiply it by another 1.02 per level!

wowCubes.name: Wow! Cube Production
wowCubes.description: For each level past 60 (yes, this does unlock at level 70, but just trust me), gain +5% more Wow! Cubes. Every 10 levels past 60, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowTesseracts.name: Wow! Tesseract Production
wowTesseracts.description: For each level past 80, gain +5% more Wow! Tesseracts. Every 10 levels past 80, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowHyperCubes.name: Wow! Hypercube Production
wowHyperCubes.description: For each level past 100, gain +5% more Wow! Hypercubes. Every 10 levels past 100, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowPlatonicCubes.name: Wow! Platonic Cube Production
wowPlatonicCubes.description: For each level past 120, gain +5% more Wow! Platonic Cubes. Every 10 levels past 120, multiply the bonus by 1.07.
wowPlatonicCubes.effect: Current Effect: +{{mult}} Wow! Platonic Cube Gain

wowHepteractCubes.name: Wow! Hepteract Production
wowHepteractCubes.description: For each level past 150, gain +5% more Wow! Hepteracts. Every 10 levels past 150, multiply the bonus by 1.07.

wowOcteracts.name: Wow! Octeracts!... Wait, what?
wowOcteracts.description: For each level past 209, gain +5% more Wow! Octeracts. What's more, multiply this by 1.02 per level as well!

ambrosiaLuck.name: Ambrosia luck
ambrosiaLuck.description: For each level past 229, gain +4 Ambrosia Luck! I like stats with symbols next to them.

redAmbrosiaLuck.name: Red luck
redAmbrosiaLuck.description: For each level past 259, gain +1 Red Luck! I like stats with symbols next to them.

offeringTimerScaling.name: Offerings - Prestige Timer Scaling
offeringTimerScaling.description: To encourage longer Prestiges, Gain +10% Offerings on Prestige per second, past 10 seconds in your current Prestige.
offeringTimerScaling.effect: Current Effect: Gain {{mult}} more Offerings from Prestige timer

duplicationRune.name: Duplication Rune XL!
duplicationRune.description: Power up your Duplication Rune! Each level 40+ grants +0.4 to Duplication Rune's Rune Coefficient.
duplicationRune.effect: Current Effect: Duplication Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{duplicationRune}}

speedRune.name: Speed Rune XL
speedRune.description: Power up your Speed Rune! Each level 20+ grants +0.5 to Speed Rune's Rune Coefficient.
speedRune.effect: Current Effect: Speed Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{speedRune}}

prismRune.name: Prism Rune XL
prismRune.description: Power up your Prism Rune! Each level 60+ grants +0.3 to Prism Rune's Rune Coefficient.
prismRune.effect: Current Effect: Prism Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{prismRune}}

thriftRune.name: Thrift Rune XL
thriftRune.description: Power up your Thrift Rune! Each level 80+ grants +0.2 to Thrift Rune's Rune Coefficient.
thriftRune.effect: Current Effect: Thrift Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{thriftRune}}

SIRune.name: SI Rune XL
SIRune.description: Power up your SI Rune! Each level 100+ grants +0.1 to SI Rune's Rune Coefficient.
SIRune.effect: Current Effect: SI Rune - Rune Coefficient +{{siRune}}

autoPrestige.name: Auto Prestiging!
autoPrestige.description: Why prestige by hand, when you can make your computer do it for you?

tier1CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 1 Crystal Autobuy
tier1CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Diamond Refineries! Also automagically buys the first Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier2CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 2 Crystal Autobuy
tier2CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Coal Plants! Also automagically buys the second Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier3CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 3 Crystal Autobuy
tier3CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Coal Rigs! Also automagically buys the third Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier4CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 4 Crystal Autobuy
tier4CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Diamond Pickaxes! Also automagically buys the fourth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

tier5CrystalAutobuy.name: Tier 5 Crystal Autobuy
tier5CrystalAutobuy.description: You can now automatically buy Pandora's Boxes! Also automagically buys the fifth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it.

achievementTalismanUnlock.name: Achievement Talisman!
achievementTalismanUnlock.description: Wear your Achievements with pride, and unlock the new Achievement Talisman!

achievementTalismanEnhancement.name: Achievement Talisman Enhancement
achievementTalismanEnhancement.description: Your Achievement Talisman may be leveled up one additional time for each Synergism Level!
achievementTalismanEnhancement.effect: Current Effect: Achievement Talisman may be leveled up {{level}} additional times.

salvageChallengeBuff.name: Salvage Challenge Buff
salvageChallengeBuff.description:
Gain +25 Salvage.
If you are in any Challenge, this value is doubled.
If you are in Challenge 15, this value is doubled.
If you are in EXALT, this value is tripled!
Effects may stack.

runeLevel.name: Progressive Achievement - Purchased Rune Levels
runeLevel.description: Gain AP based on the sum of all rune levels purchased! Best Total: {{x}}
runeLevel.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 1,000 Rune Levels purchased, up to 200,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Rune Levels purchased, up to 1,000,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 12,500 Rune Levels purchased, up to 5,000,000 Levels.

freeRuneLevel.name: Progressive Achievement - Free Rune Levels
freeRuneLevel.description: Gain AP based on the sum of all your free rune levels! Best Total: {{x}}
freeRuneLevel.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 250 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 25,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 750 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 150,000 Levels.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Free Rune Levels owned, up to 500,000 Levels.

singularityCount.name: Progressive Achievement - Singularity Count
singularityCount.description: Gain AP based on the highest Singularity you have reached! Highest Reached: {{x}}
singularityCount.apSource:
Gain +9 AP for Singularities 1-100
Gain +12 AP for Singularities 101-200
Gain +15 AP for Singularities 201-300

ambrosiaCount.name: Progressive Achievement - Lifetime Ambrosia
ambrosiaCount.description: Gain AP based on your lifetime Ambrosia! Lifetime Ambrosia: {{x}}
ambrosiaCount.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 100 Ambrosia, up to 20,000.
Gain +1 AP per 10,000 Ambrosia, up to 2,000,000.
Gain up to 400 MORE AP, by reaching 100,000,000 total Lifetime Ambrosia!

redAmbrosiaCount.name: Progressive Achievement - Lifetime Red Ambrosia
redAmbrosiaCount.description: Gain AP based on your lifetime Red Ambrosia! Lifetime Red Ambrosia: {{x}}
redAmbrosiaCount.apSource:
Gain +1 AP per 25 Red Ambrosia, up to 5,000.
Gain +1 AP per 2,500 Red Ambrosia, up to 500,000.
Gain up to 400 MORE AP, by reaching 5,000,000 total Lifetime Red Ambrosia!

exalts.name: Progressive Achievement - EXALT Completions
exalts.description: Gain AP for each EXALT you have completed!
exalts.apSource:
No Golden Quark Upgrades: {{num1}}/{{cap1}} AP
One Challenge Caps: {{num2}}/{{cap2}} AP
Twenty Ascensions: {{num3}}/{{cap3}} AP
No Octeract Effects: {{num4}}/{{cap4}} AP
No Ambrosia Upgrades: {{num5}}/{{cap5}} AP
Grand Singularity Speedrun: {{num6}}/{{cap6}} AP
Sadistic III: {{num7}}/{{cap7}} AP
Taxman's Last Stand: {{num8}}/{{cap8}} AP

singularityUpgrades.name: Progressive Achievement - Golden Quark Upgrades
singularityUpgrades.description: Gain AP for each Golden Quark upgrade you've maxxed!
singularityUpgrades.apSource: Capped upgrades: +5 AP If the upgraded level (excluding free upgrades) is at least the base maximum level.

octeractUpgrades.name: Progressive Achievement - Octeract Upgrades
octeractUpgrades.description: Gain AP for each Octeract upgrade you've maxxed!
octeractUpgrades.apSource: Capped upgrades: +8 AP if the upgraded level (excluding free upgrades) is the maximum level.

redAmbrosiaUpgrades.name: Progressive Achievement - Red Ambrosia Upgrades
redAmbrosiaUpgrades.description: Gain AP for each Red Ambrosia upgrade you've maxxed!
redAmbrosiaUpgrades.apSource: For each upgrade leveled to the max: +10 AP

talismanRarities.name: Talisman Rarity
talismanRarities.description: Your talismans grant AP based on their rarity! Best sum of rarities: {{x}}
talismanRarities.apSource: Gain +5 AP for each rarity. Unlocked Talismans have a rarity of at least 1.

alerts.36: Felicidades por tu primer Prestigio. El primero de muchos. Obtienes Ofrendas. ¡Puedes usarlas en la nueva pestaña de Runas! [Runas Desbloqueadas, Logros, Edificios de Diamantes y algunas Mejoras]
alerts.38: Hmm, parece que te estás haciendo rico, siendo capaz de obtener 1 Googol de diamantes en un solo Prestigio. ¿Y si te damos otra Runa? [¡Runa de Duplicación disponible en pestaña de Runas!]
alerts.255: ¡Wow! Has ganado 1e17 (100 Cuatrillones) puntos en una sola Ascensión. Por eso, ahora puedes generar Hepteractos si superas 1.66e17 (166.6 Cuatrillion) de puntos en una Ascensión. ¡Buena suerte!

achievements.tieredExtraRewards: This Tiered Achievement has extra rewards!
achievements.ungroupedExtraRewards: This Achievement has an additional reward!

details.prestige: Coins, Coin Producers, Coin Upgrades, and Crystals are reset, but in return you gain diamonds and a few Offerings. Required: {{amount}}/1e16 Coins || TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.
details.transcension: Reset all Coin and Diamond Upgrades/Features, Crystal Upgrades & Producers, for Mythos/Offerings. Required: {{amount}}/1e100 Coins || TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.
details.reincarnation: Reset ALL previous reset tiers, but you will gain Particles, Obtainium and Offerings! Required: {{amount}}/1e300 Mythos Shards || TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.
details.acceleratorBoost: Reset Coin Producers/Upgrades, Crystals and Diamonds in order to increase the power of your Accelerators. Required: {{amount}}/{{required}} Diamonds.

transcensionChallenge.in: Are you tired of being in your Challenge or stuck? Click to leave Challenge {{n}}. Progress: {{amount}}/{{required}} Coins. TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.
transcensionChallenge.out: You're not in a Transcension Challenge right now. Get in one before you can leave it, duh!

in.coins: Are you done or tired of being in your Challenge? Click to leave Challenge {{n}}. Progress: {{amount}}/{{required}} Coins. TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.
in.transcendShards: Are you done or tired of being in your Challenge? Click to leave Challenge {{n}}. Progress: {{amount}}/{{required}} Mythos Shards. TIME SPENT: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.

reincarnationChallenge.out: You're not in a Reincarnation Challenge right now. How could you leave what you are not in?

details.ascensionChallenge: Click this if you're in an Ascension Challenge and want to leave. You get it already!
details.ascension: Ascend, C-10 is required! +{{cubeAmount}} Wow! Cubes for doing it! Time: {{timeSpent}} Seconds. (Real-time {{realTimeSpent}} Seconds)
details.singularity: Are you willing to give up your laurels for a greater Challenge? The Ant God bribes you with {{gqAmount}} Golden Quarks. Time: {{timeSpent}} Seconds.

upgrades.1: Promueve unidad y romance dentro de la colonia. [+12% Velocidad de Hormigas / nivel]
upgrades.2: Endulza las migas para incrementar su valor [Cada nivel incrementa Miga -> Eficiencia de conversión de Moneda, hasta ^50.000.000]
upgrades.3: Asalta al Recaudador hasta someterlo [Hasta -99,5% Impuestos]
upgrades.4: Te asusta para que corras más rápido [Hasta x20]
upgrades.5: Imita tu cuerpo mediante poderes cambiaformas mágicos [Hasta x40]
upgrades.6: Trata de complacer al Dios Hormiga... pero fracasa [Más Ofrendas]
upgrades.7: Te ayuda a construir cosas aquí y allá [Retraso de Coste de Construcción +3% / nivel, Máximo de 9.999.999%]
upgrades.8: Sabe cómo sazonar la comida [¡Hasta 1.000x EXP de Runas!]
upgrades.9: Can make your message to Ant God a little more clear [+1 all Rune Levels / level, Cap 3,000]
upgrades.11: Una ofrenda valiosa para el Dios Hormiga [Gana hasta 3x Recompensas de Sacrificio]
upgrades.12: Traiciona al Dios Hormiga aumentando la fragilidad de tu dimensión [Desbloquea Talismán Hormiga, Cronómetros hasta 2x veces más rápidos en mayoría de cosas]

descriptions.5: ¡Obtén una Hormiga Reina que produce Mega-Procreadoras automáticamente!

descriptions.7: ¡Obtén una TODOPODEROSA HORMIGA que produce Hormigas Señor Real automáticamente!
descriptions.8: ¡Gana un DISCÍPULO DEL DIOS HORMIGA que produce HORMIGAS TODOPODEROSAS automáticamente!

ants.header: Las hormigas te dan la bienvenida a su hogar.
ants.hover: Pasa sobre los iconos para la descripción. ¡Haz clic en ellos para comprar!
ants.youHaveGalacticCrumbs: Tienes {{x}} Migas Galácticas [{{y}}/s], proporcionando un Multiplicador de Monedas de {{z}}
ants.sacrificeWhenTimer: Sacrificar cuando el cronómetro sea al menos {{x}} segundos ({{y}}), Actualmente: {{z}}
ants.autoReset: This resets your Crumbs, Ants and Ant Upgrades in exchange for some Ant Speed and resources. Continue?

1.name: Desafío Sin Multiplicadores || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
1.flavor: Los Multiplicadores hacen el juego un poco rápido. ¡Quitémoslos!
1.restrictions: Trasciende y alcanza la meta solo que los Multiplicadores no hacen nada salvo actuar como Aceleradores, ¡cuya potencia se ha reducido un 50%!
1.goal: Meta: Obtén {{value}} Monedas en el desafío.

per.1: +2 base Multiplier Boosts! [+0.02 to power!] Current:
per.2: Duplication Rune level scaling coefficient is increased by 0.75! Current:
per.3: ¡+0,04 Experiencia de Runas base por ofrenda! Actual:

1.first: ¡+1 Multiplicador Gratis! ¡+1 EXP base por ofrenda usada!

2.name: Desafío Sin Aceleradores || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
2.flavor: ¿Quién Necesita Aceleradores? Básicamente no hacen nada ahora.
2.restrictions: Trasciende y alcanza la meta ¡Solo que los Aceleradores no hacen nada! Los Multiplicadores se han debilitado también.
2.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Monedas en el desafío.

per.2: ¡+5% al Poder de los Potenciadores de Aceleradores! Actual:

2.first: +1 a las ofrendas base mediante Prestigio y Transcensión.

3.name: Desafío Sin Fragmentos || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
3.flavor: Bien, ahora estás pensando, ¿cómo puedo hacer el juego más difícil?
3.restrictions: Transciende y alcanza el objetivo sin producir Cristales o Fragmentos de Mythos.

per.1: ¡Cristal -> +0,04 al exponente de conversión de Moneda! Actual:
per.2: +0,5% a producción de Gran Maeses por productor de Mythos comprado. Actual:
per.3: Al usar una runa, todas las demás ganan +0,01 EXP. Actual:

3.first: ¡Obtén una ofrenda automáticamente cada dos segundos!

4.name: Desafío Coste+ || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
4.flavor: Ya eres millonario, ¿pero la inflación no ha ocurrido aún? ¡Todavía no!
4.restrictions: Transciende y alcanza el objetivo con los costes de los productores de Monedas/Cristales, Aceleradores y Multiplicadores cuestan más. [¡Se vuelve más difícil cada vez!]
4.goal: Objetivo: Consigue {{value}} Monedas en el desafío.

per.1: La escalada del precio para Aceleradores se ralentiza por +5 compras. Actual:
per.2: La escalada del precio para Multiplicadores se ralentiza por +2 compras. Actual:
per.3: Retraso del Costo de Construcciones +0,5%. Actual:

5.name: Desafío Diamantes Reducidos || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
5.flavor: ¿Has parado a pensar cómo ganas tantos diamantes?
5.restrictions: Trasciende y alcanza la meta salvo que ganas muchos menos Diamantes de todas las fuentes [¡Se complica cada vez!]
5.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Monedas en el Desafío.

per.1: ¡+0,01 Exponente de Conversión Moneda -> Diamante al Prestigio! Actual:
per.2: ¡Multiplica la producción de Cristales por 10! Actual:

6.name: Desafío Mayores Impuestos || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
6.flavor: El recaudador se ha enterado de tu reciente reencarnación...
6.restrictions: Reencárnate y alcanza la meta salvo que los impuestos tienen un máximo más bajo, y la producción se divide por 1e250.
6.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Fragmentos de Mythos en el desafío.

7.name: Desafío Sin Multiplicadores/Aceleradores || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
7.restrictions: Reencarna y alcanza la meta salvo que Aceleradores y Multiplicadores no hacen nada. La Producción de Monedas se divide por 1e1.250.
7.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Fragmentos de Mythos en el desafío.

per.1: ¡+0,04 exponente al poder de potenciadores de Acelerador/Multiplicador! Actual:
per.3: +15% more Transcension Count when Transcending! Current:

7.first: ¡+25% al Poder de Potenciadores Multiplicador! La primera Mejora Global de Diamantes por Impulso de Discord.

8.name: Desafío Coste++ || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
8.flavor: ¿Creías que podrías superar la inflación Reencarnando?
8.restrictions: Reencárnate y alcanza la meta salvo que la Escalada de Precios para productores y Aceleradores/multiplicadores sube mucho, mucho más rápido.
8.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Fragmentos de Mythos en el desafío.

per.1: ¡+0,25 a Poder de Construcción base! Actual:
per.3: Offerings +4% (additive with other Challenge bonuses) ! Current:

8.first: ¡Desbloquea El Hormiguero! Incluye 20 nuevas Investigaciones y Mejora Global de Diamante.

9.name: Desafío Sin Runas || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
9.flavor: No te volverás a quejar de que Prisma sea malo jamás.
9.restrictions: Reencárnate y alcanza la meta salvo que las runas solo tienen efectos de nivel 1. Toda Producción de Moneda se divide por e2.000.000.
9.first: Unlock Talismans and Blessings, in the rune Tab. A Global Diamond Upgrade.

10.name: Desafío Sadismo I || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
10.flavor: Lamento lo que he desatado sobre el mundo.
10.restrictions: Reencárnate y alcanza la meta ¡salvo que te enfrentas a los cinco primeros desafíos A LA VEZ! Producción de Moneda /e12.500.000.
10.goal: Meta: Gana {{value}} Monedas en el Desafío.

per.1: ¡+100 ELO base por sacrificar hormigas! Actual:
per.2: ¡+2% Recompensa por Sacrificio de Hormigas! Actual:
per.3: Offerings +10% (additive with other Challenge bonuses)! Current:

11.name: Desafío Hormigas Reducidas || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
11.flavor: La gran Guerra Hormiga del 21 diezmó a las hormigas especializadas.
11.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but ant upgrades cannot be purchased. To compensate, Challenge 8 and 9 completions give free ant upgrades. FOR ASCENSION CHALLENGES YOU MUST CLEAR CHALLENGE 10 TO ATTEMPT THEM.
11.goal: Objetivo: Completa el Desafío 10 [Desafío Sadístico I] {{value}} veces.

per.3: +1 to the Rune Level Coefficient of the first five runes! Current:

11.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the ability to open Tesseracts! You also get to 'Corrupt' your game... and explore this in the Campaigns feature.

12.name: Desafío Sin Reencarnación || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
12.flavor: Por alguna razón, simplemente no puedes hacerlo.
12.restrictions: Asciende y alcanza la meta ¡pero no ganas Partículas y no puedes Reencarnarte para nada! Producción de Hormigas ^0,5.
12.goal: Objetivo: Completa el Desafío 10 [Desafío Sadístico I] {{value}} veces.

per.3: +20% more Reincarnation Count on Reincarnation! Current:

12.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the mystical Spirit Power! Find these in the Runes tab. Also adds additional Campaigns and Corruptions!

13.name: Desafío Impuestos++ || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
13.restrictions: Asciende y alcanza la meta, pero los impuestos son mucho más altos y crecen con finalizaciones de desafíos. Producción de Hormigas ^0,23
13.goal: Objetivo: Completa el Desafío 10 [Desafío Sadístico I] {{value}} veces.

per.2: ¡+6 a Niveles Máximos de talismán! Actual:

13.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the power of the Hypercube! Unlock even more Campaigns and Corruptions!

14.name: Desafío Sin Investigación || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
14.flavor: Esta dimensión nunca progresó más allá de la edad oscura. Muchos temen poner un pie en la calle.
14.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but you do not gain Obtainium nor are any Researches purchasable. Ant production ^0.2.
14.goal: Objetivo: Completa el Desafío 10 [Desafío Sadístico I] {{value}} veces.

per.1: +50% stronger effect on Researches 1x1 through 1x5. Current:
per.2: +1 Research purchased per roomba tick! Current:
per.3: +1.5 to the Rune Level Coefficient of the first five runes! Current:

14.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and discover a new type of ideal cube - a Platonic one perhaps? Plus more Campaigns and Corruptions of course.

15.name: Desafío Sadismo II || {{- value}} Finalizaciones
15.flavor: La peor atrocidad que se puede cometer es ser testigo, sin remordimientos, del sufrimiento de otros.
15.restrictions: Asciende y alcanza la meta pero todas tus corrupciones serán de 11, y la producción de Hormigas ^0,01.
15.goal: Meta: {{value}} Monedas, pero obtienes bonus en función de tu mejor intento.
15.noGoal: No hay meta que cumplir, pero ganas bonus en función de tu mejor intento.

upgradeDescriptions.1: [1x1] ¡Lo tienes! +16.666% Cubos 3D de Ascensiones por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.2: [1x2] Plutus grants you +3 Salvage per level!
upgradeDescriptions.3: [1x3] Atenea te otorga +10% Obtainium extra, y un +80% Auto Obtainium por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.4: [1x4] ¡Mantienes esas útiles 5 mejoras de automatización en la pestaña de mejoras!
upgradeDescriptions.5: [1x5] You keep the Mythos upgrade automation upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.6: [1x6] You keep the automatic "Mythos gain" upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.7: [1x7] Automatically buy each Particle building whenever possible.
upgradeDescriptions.9: [1x9] The Research automator in shop now automatically buys cheapest when enabled. It's like a roomba kinda!
upgradeDescriptions.10: [1x10] Desbloquea algunas herramientas para automatizar Ascensiones o algo. Bastante caro pero lo merece.
upgradeDescriptions.11: [2x1] ¡Lo entendiste de nuevo! +9.09% Cubos 3D al Ascender por Nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.12: [2x2] Raise Building Power to the power of (1 + level * 0.09).
upgradeDescriptions.13: [2x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.14: [2x4] Iris shines her light on you. Each level increases the amount of Salvage she gives by 1%!
upgradeDescriptions.15: [2x5] Ares teaches you the Art of War. The effect of Ares Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.16: [2x6] You got it buster! For Speed and Prism Runes, add +1 to their Rune Coefficients per level!
upgradeDescriptions.17: [2x7] Yep. +5 exponent per level to crystals.
upgradeDescriptions.19: [2x9] Unlocks new Coin upgrades ranging from start of Ascend to after Challenge 10 and beyond.
upgradeDescriptions.20: [2x10] The Rune automator in shop now spends all Offerings automatically, splitting them into unlocked runes evenly. It also buys levels 20 times faster. Have fun!
upgradeDescriptions.21: [3x1] Perhaps Score will benefit you more? Gain +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.22: [3x2] Te effect of Artemis Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.23: [3x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.24: [3x4] Plutus teaches you the Art of the Deal. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.25: [3x5] Moloch lends you a hand in communicating with Ant God. The effect of his Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.26: [3x6] Start Ascensions with enough EXP for 3 Rune Levels per level (may actually be more or less depending on Rune Coefficient). Only affects the first five Runes.
upgradeDescriptions.27: [3x7] Al Ascender, empezarás con 1 de cada edificio de Reencarnación para acelerar esas Ascensiones.
upgradeDescriptions.28: [3x8] Bueno, ¿Creo que lo entiendes? Gana +1% partículas de Reencarnación por segundo.
upgradeDescriptions.29: [3x9] Añade +4 al máximo de Desafíos de Reencarnación por nivel. ¡Finalizaciones tras 25 requieren mucho más!
upgradeDescriptions.31: [4x1] You again? +5% more Ascension Score per level.
upgradeDescriptions.32: [4x2] Gana +0,1% EXP de runas por cada segundo en esta Ascensión. ¡No tiene límite!
upgradeDescriptions.33: [4x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get yet another additional Tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.34: [4x4] Chronos overclocks the universe for your personal benefit. The effect of Chronos Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.35: [4x5] Aphrodite increases the fertility of your coins. The effect of Aphrodite Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.36: [4x6] Raise Building Power to (1 + 0.05 * Level) once more.
upgradeDescriptions.37: [4x7] For Thrift and Superior Intellect runes, add +1 to the Rune Level Coefficient per level!
upgradeDescriptions.38: [4x8] Gain +0.5% more Tesseracts on Ascension for each additional level in a Corruption you enable.
upgradeDescriptions.39: [4x9] Instead of the Ascension Score multiplier being 1.03^(C10 completions), it is now 1.035^(C10 completions)!
upgradeDescriptions.40: [4x10] Athena is very smart. The effect of Athena Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.41: [5x1] Yeah yeah yeah, +5% Ascension Score per level. Isn't it enough?
upgradeDescriptions.42: [5x2] You now gain +4% Immaculate Obtainium per level, which is not dependent on corruptions!
upgradeDescriptions.43: [5x3] Gain another +3% Immaculate Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.44: [5x4] Blah blah blah Midas works harder. The effect of Midas Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.45: [5x5] Blah blah blah Hermes works harder. The effect of Hermes Tributes is raised to the power of (1 + level / 100).
upgradeDescriptions.48: [5x8] When you ascend, start with 1 Worker Ant (this is a lot better than it sounds!)
upgradeDescriptions.49: [5x9] Al ascender, gana 1 finalización de cada Desafío 6-8.
upgradeDescriptions.50: [5x10] What doesn't this boost? +0.01% Accelerators, Multipliers, Accelerator Boosts, +0.02% Obtainium, +0.02% Offerings, +1 Effective ELO, 0.00066% Tax reduction per level. Every 10,000 levels grant +0.6% Talisman Power!
upgradeDescriptions.51: [Cx1] Wow! Bakery is open!!! Immediately unlock all automations in the Wow! Cubes tab, and Research as well.
upgradeDescriptions.52: [Cx2] These sugar cookies sure boost your blood sugar. Gain +1% Global Speed per level.
upgradeDescriptions.53: [Cx3] Qué sustancioso tentempié. Gana +0,1% Quarks por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.54: [Cx4] Pretty dry, but they suffice. Gain +1% Offerings per level.
upgradeDescriptions.55: [Cx5] An inventive take on the original chip cookie. Gain +1% Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.56: [Cx6] Estas son más exóticas. Gana +1 nivel base al finalizar Desafío 1 por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.57: [Cx7] ¡Yummy! Ahora sí... o tal vez no. Aumenta en 1 el máximo de Mejoras de Cubo 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 5x1.
upgradeDescriptions.58: [Cx8] ¡Un poco festivo! En eventos, multiplica las ganancias de todos los Cubos x1,25.
upgradeDescriptions.59: [Cx9] Quite sour for a cookie. But it increases your Ascension Speed by +0.25% per level, so who is to complain?
upgradeDescriptions.60: [Cx10] Panaderías ¡Wow! tienen extra jengibre para su venta navideña. Reduce el coste de comprar Quarks Dorados un 0,003% por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.61: [Cx11] Edible but prone to mistakes. Adds 125 whole milliseconds to the tolerance of code 'time', and increases its reward by +2% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.62: [Cx12] Platonic loves toffee. 8x your Obtainium and Offering gain in Challenge 15.
upgradeDescriptions.63: [Cx13] Brownie Cookies, the best of both worlds. Increase 3D Cube Gain by 1% based on owned Hepteracts (+3% per OOM).
upgradeDescriptions.64: [Cx14] Algunos dicen que Dios Hormiga mismo redactó estas suertes. Cuando ganas una estatua de Cubos Platónicos, ganas dos en su lugar.
upgradeDescriptions.65: [Cx15] That's amore, but is quite a crumbful! Multiply Ant Speed by 1.004 per purchased Ant.
upgradeDescriptions.66: [Cx16] Desearías tener tan solo una galleta más preparada por ella. Gana x2 de todos los Cubos hasta comprar Omega.
upgradeDescriptions.67: [Cx17] ¿¿¿Qué diablos tiene esto??? Bah, el máximo nivel del Talismán Metafísico aumenta en 1.337.
upgradeDescriptions.68: [Cx18] ¡Pero qué...! Ni siquiera son galletas. +0,01% Quarks por nivel de esta mejora. ¡A nivel 1.000 un +5% extra!
upgradeDescriptions.69: [Cx19] Galletas que no recordarás más. +12% Quarks Dorados en esta Singularidad.
upgradeDescriptions.70: [Cx20] The pinnacle of baking. Nothing you'll eat will taste better than this. Gain +0.01% more Octeracts per level on Ascension if the average level of your Corruptions is at least 14.
upgradeDescriptions.71: [Cx21] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Obtainium gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.72: [Cx22] For each Talisman Rarity, multiply Offering gain by 1.04.
upgradeDescriptions.73: [Cx23] Each level adds 1 bonus level to the Infinite Ascent rune!
upgradeDescriptions.74: [Cx24] Add +0.30 to all Corruption Multiplier values.
upgradeDescriptions.75: [Cx25] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Golden Quark upgrades per level! (additive with all other boosts)
upgradeDescriptions.76: [Cx26] Each level gives <<lightblue | +1% Ambrosia Bar Points >> for each time threshold you have reached!
upgradeDescriptions.78: [Cx28] Each level adds +0.3% effectiveness to free Octeract Upgrades per level!
upgradeDescriptions.79: [Cx29] Gain Ambrosia Luck when this upgrade is purchased, based on your Lifetime Red Ambrosia! [Formula is 10 * (Log_10(x))^2]
upgradeDescriptions.80: [Cx30] You intercept a singular message: <<gray|'Why don't you visit more often?'>>...

cubeMetadata.maxLevel: Coste: 0 Cubos ¡Wow! ¡Esta mejora está al máximo! wow

cubes.howManyCubesOpen:
¿Cuántos cubos te gustaría abrir? ¡Tienes {{x}}! 
Puedes introducir un porcentaje de cubos para abrir, por ejemplo: "50%" o "100%". 
Puedes comenzar la entrada con "-" (pon un valor negativo) para poner el valor que guardar, que abre todos los cubos excepto el número especificado (también funciona con %).

validation.negative: No puedes abrir un número negativo de cubos.
validation.invalidPercent: No puedes abrir {{x}}% de tus cubos...

calculate.timePrompt: ¿Cuán lejos en el futuro querrías llegar en el futuro? Cualquier cosa te espera cuando es temporada de testeo.
calculate.offlineEarnings: Mientras estabas fuera, tus Soberanos de Inactividad ganaron:

descriptions.2: [1x2] Aumenta el número de Multiplicadores gratuitos ganados un 20% de todas las fuentes.
descriptions.3: [1x3] Aumenta el número de Potenciadores de Aceleradores gratuitos ganados un 20% de todas las fuentes.
descriptions.4: [1x4] +10% Rune Power to the first five Runes! (Yes, there are more than five runes)
descriptions.5: [1x5] Multiplica la producción de los productores de Cristales un 1e4.
descriptions.16: [1x16] Gana +5% Potenciadores de Acelerador gratis por nivel.
descriptions.17: [1x17] Gana +5% Potenciadores de Acelerador gratis por nivel.
descriptions.18: [1x18] Gana +2 Aceleradores gratis por Potenciadores de Acelerador.
descriptions.19: [1x19] Gana +2 Aceleradores gratis por Potenciadores de Acelerador.
descriptions.20: [1x20] Gana +3 Aceleradores gratis por Potenciadores de Acelerador.
descriptions.21: [1x21] +1% Rune Power to the first five Runes per level.
descriptions.22: [1x22] Cada Ofrenda usada incrementa la EXP de runa un 0,6 por nivel.
descriptions.23: [1x23] ¡Cada Ofrenda usada incrementa la EXP de runa otro 0,3 por nivel!
descriptions.24: [1x24] Increase your Base Offerings by 0.4 per level.
descriptions.25: [1x25] Increase your Base Offerings by 0.6 per level.
descriptions.26: [2x1] Multiplica la producción de todos los productores de Cristal un 150% por nivel (Multiplicativo).
descriptions.27: [2x2] Multiplica la producción de todos los productores de Cristal un 150% por nivel (Multiplicativo).
descriptions.28: [2x3] El exponente de Monedas se incrementa un 0,08 por nivel.
descriptions.29: [2x4] El exponente de Monedas se incrementa otro 0,08 por nivel.
descriptions.30: [2x5] El exponente de Monedas se incrementa OTRO 0,08 por nivel.
descriptions.31: [2x6] ¿No quieres hacer galletas mejor? Puedes estar desconectado otras 4 horas más por nivel (Base 72hr).
descriptions.32: [2x7] ¿No quieres hacer muchas galletas mejor? ¡Aumenta el cronómetro máximo desconectado otras 4 horas por nivel!
descriptions.33: [2x8] Gana +11% más Potenciadores de Multiplicación por Fragmentos de Mythos por nivel.
descriptions.34: [2x9] Gana otros +11% más Potenciadores de Multiplicación por Fragmentos de Mythos por nivel.
descriptions.35: [2x10] Gana OTROS +11% más Potenciadores de Multiplicación por Fragmentos de Mythos por nivel.
descriptions.36: [2x11] El poder de edificios crece un 5% más rápido por nivel.
descriptions.37: [2x12] El poder de edificios crece un 2,5% más rápido por nivel.
descriptions.38: [2x13] El poder de edificios crece un 2,5% más rápido por nivel.
descriptions.39: [2x14] El poder de edificios afecta a la producción de Cristal a ritmo reducido.
descriptions.40: [2x15] El poder de edificios afecta a la producción de Fragmentos de Mythos a ritmo reducido.
descriptions.41: [2x16] Start Reincarnations with automatic A.Boosts unlocked. Note: this Research doesn't affect earning achievements.
descriptions.42: [2x17] Empieza las reencarnaciones con Generadores automáticos desbloqueados.
descriptions.43: [2x18] Empieza las reencarnaciones con Mejoras de M. automáticas desbloqueadas.
descriptions.44: [2x19] Empieza las reencarnaciones con Mejoras de D. automáticas desbloqueadas.
descriptions.45: [2x20] Empieza las reencarnaciones con producción de Diamantes automáticas desbloqueada.
descriptions.47: [2x22] Desbloquea las mejoras de Reencarnación 1-5. [Las mejoras cuestan entre 1 y 1.000 partículas]
descriptions.48: [2x23] Desbloquea las mejoras de Reencarnación 6-10. [Las mejoras cuestan entre 100.000 y 1e22 partículas]
descriptions.49: [2x24] Desbloquea las mejoras de Reencarnación 11-15. [Las mejoras cuestan entre 1e30 y 1e60 partículas]
descriptions.50: [2x25] Desbloquea las mejoras de Reencarnación 16-20. [¡Quizá quieras esperar a que el Desafío 8 sea posible!]
descriptions.51: [3x1] Los impuestos crecen un 5,0% más lentos por nivel. [Hasta un -50%]
descriptions.52: [3x2] Los impuestos crecen un 2,5% más lentos por nivel. [Hasta un -75%]
descriptions.53: [3x3] Los impuestos crecen un 1,25% más lentos por nivel. [Hasta un -87,5%]
descriptions.54: [3x4] Los impuestos crecen un 0,625% más lentos por nivel. [Hasta un -93,75%]
descriptions.55: [3x5] Los impuestos crecen un 0,3125% más lentos por nivel. [Hasta un -96,875%]
descriptions.56: [3x6] La escalada de precios de edificios se retrasa un 0,5% por nivel.
descriptions.57: [3x7] La escalada de precios de edificios se retrasa un 0,5% por nivel.
descriptions.58: [3x8] La escalada de precios de edificios se retrasa un 0,5% por nivel.
descriptions.59: [3x9] La escalada de precios de edificios se retrasa un 0,5% por nivel.
descriptions.60: [3x10] La escalada de precios de edificios se retrasa un 0,5% por nivel.
descriptions.61: [3x11] ¡Gana un +50% de tu mejor Obtainium por segundo AUTOMÁTICAMENTE!
descriptions.62: [3x12] Gana un +10% adicional de tu mejor Obtainium por segundo automáticamente.
descriptions.63: [3x13] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 2 seconds you gain +1 Base Obtainium per level.
descriptions.64: [3x14] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 5 seconds you gain +2 Base Obtainium per level.
descriptions.65: [3x15] Gain +20% more Obtainium per level. Quite simple!
descriptions.66: [3x16] Aumenta en 5 el máximo de finalizaciones de [Sin Multiplicadores] por nivel.
descriptions.67: [3x17] Aumenta en 5 el máximo de finalizaciones de [Sin Aceleradores] por nivel.
descriptions.68: [3x18] Aumenta en 5 el máximo de finalizaciones de [Sin Fragmentos] por nivel.
descriptions.69: [3x19] Aumenta en 5 el máximo de finalizaciones de [Coste+] por nivel.
descriptions.70: [3x20] Aumenta en 5 el máximo de finalizaciones de [Diamantes Reducidos] por nivel.
descriptions.71: [3x21] Gana automáticamente finalizaciones del Desafío 1 al entrar en un Desafío de Reencarnación
descriptions.72: [3x22] Gana automáticamente finalizaciones del Desafío 2 al entrar en un Desafío de Reencarnación
descriptions.73: [3x23] Gana automáticamente finalizaciones del Desafío 3 al entrar en un Desafío de Reencarnación
descriptions.74: [3x24] Gana automáticamente finalizaciones del Desafío 4 al entrar en un Desafío de Reencarnación
descriptions.75: [3x25] Gana automáticamente finalizaciones del Desafío 5 al entrar en un Desafío de Reencarnación
descriptions.76: [4x1] Here's +10% Obtainium per level to help you afford these next Researches!
descriptions.77: [4x2] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Speed Rune, per level!
descriptions.78: [4x3] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Duplication Rune, per level!
descriptions.79: [4x4] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Prism Rune, per level!
descriptions.80: [4x5] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Thrift Rune, per level!
descriptions.81: [4x6] You thought the previous Researches are expensive? You're going to need this! [+10% Obtainium per level]
descriptions.82: [4x7] Permanently UNLOCK the Rune of Superior Intellect! [Bonuses: Offerings, Obtainium and Ant Speed]
descriptions.83: [4x8] Taking forever to level up that new Rune? Here's +5% Superior Intellect Rune EXP per level.
descriptions.84: [4x9] Does the Superior Intellect Rune kinda suck? Power it up! +0.5% Rune Power only for SI Rune per level!
descriptions.85: [4x10] ¡Gana +0,01% más Ofrendas por nivel por Desafío finalizado!
descriptions.86: [4x11] Yeah, going back to basics. +5% Accelerators per level.
descriptions.88: [4x13] -1/5 A.Boosts SUCK: +5% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.89: [4x14] -5/5 MULTIPLIERS STILL SUCK: +20% Multiplier Boosts per level
descriptions.90: [4x15] Runes don't suck at all, but why not make them even BETTER? +1% Rune Power per level!
descriptions.91: [4x16] A simple +5% Rune EXP for all Runes!
descriptions.92: [4x17] Another simple +5% Rune EXP for all Runes!
descriptions.93: [4x18] +1 Accelerator Boost per 20 Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.94: [4x19] +20 Multiplier per 8 Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.95: [4x20] Gain +4 base Offerings from by purchasing this. Easy Shmeezy.
descriptions.96: [4x21] Ants slow? Multiply Ant Speed by 1.0002 per Ant purchased.
descriptions.97: [4x22] Add +4 free levels to the first six upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.98: [4x23] Add +4 free levels to the next five upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.99: [4x24] ¡Añade +4 niveles a las primeras seis Hormigas mejorables por nivel!
descriptions.100: [4x25] Alright, Platonic is off his rocker. +1 MORE Quark per hour from Exporting for each level!
descriptions.101: [5x1] Let's add +.001 to Inceptus Ant efficiency per level?
descriptions.102: [5x2] Gain +1 free level to ALL Ants per level! A rainbow attack!
descriptions.103: [5x3] Pray to Ant God for +5% Ant Sacrifice rewards per level!
descriptions.104: [5x4] You're beginning to feel like an Ant God (Ant God): +5% Ant Sacrifice reward per level!
descriptions.105: [5x5] Buy this and be able to run the first five Challenges up to 9,001 times! (Note that requirements scale a LOT faster after 75, and again after 1,000)
descriptions.106: [5x6] Engrave your talismans with Obtainium to get +0.1% Talisman Power per level (increases the amount of free levels you get for Runes)!
descriptions.107: [5x7] Refine your talismans with the powder of Obtainium to get +0.1% Talisman Power per level, again!
descriptions.108: [5x8] ¡Un truco sencillo hace que el ELO Hormiga base aumente 25 por nivel!
descriptions.109: [5x9] ¡Un truco más complejo hace que el ELO Hormiga base aumente 25 por nivel de nuevo!
descriptions.110: [5x10] Gain +1% more Ant ELO from Ant sources per level because why not?
descriptions.111: [5x11] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Speed Rune, per level!
descriptions.112: [5x12] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Duplication Rune, per level!
descriptions.113: [5x13] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Prism Rune, per level!
descriptions.114: [5x14] Here's another +1 Rune Coefficient to Thrift Rune, per level!
descriptions.115: [5x15] Here's +1 Rune Coefficient to Superior Intellect Rune, per level! I realize you didn't have an earlier Research for this, so this has twice as many levels.
descriptions.116: [5x16] Gain yet another +0.1% Talisman Power per level! (Unlike Rune Power, Talisman Power is additive across all sources. Don't ask why.)
descriptions.117: [5x17] Incredibly, gain another +0.1% Talisman Power per level!
descriptions.118: [5x18] Try this for size: gain +0.2% Talisman Power per level! It's like twice as good as the other upgrades.
descriptions.119: [5x19] Gana +0,25% Cubos ¡Wow! por nivel al Ascender.
descriptions.120: [5x20] Gana otros +0,25% Cubos ¡Wow! por nivel al Ascender.
descriptions.121: [5x21] Bend (global) time to your will, gaining +2% Global Speed per level.
descriptions.124: [5x24] Unlock the automator for Ant Sacrifice!
descriptions.125: [5x25] Buena suerte, compañero. [+1 Quark Exportación/Hora por nivel]
descriptions.126: [6x1] 6 rows? That can't be... (+1% Accelerators / level)
descriptions.129: [6x4] Añade +1 nivel extra a máximas mejoras de Cristal multiplicados por Nivel * Log4(Fragmentos Comunes +1)
descriptions.130: [6x5] Unlock automation for leveling Talismans! Activates every 2 real life seconds.
descriptions.131: [6x6] Turn some Ant Disciples against Ant God, giving +0.5% Rune Power per level. False prophets, or false profits?
descriptions.132: [6x7] Recruit a couple other Ants towards your side as well, giving +2 free Ant upgrade levels per level.
descriptions.133: [6x8] Using some coalesced Obtainium, you can make Ant Sacrifice +3% more bountiful per level.
descriptions.134: [6x9 lol] The funny number. Gain a +6.9% bonus to Blessing Power.
descriptions.135: [6x10] Makes it so that the Talisman autobuyer automatically buys to Rarity increase!
descriptions.136: [6x11] It may be time to look back. Increase your Global Speed by +1.5% per level.
descriptions.137: [6x12] Pagando a Industrias ¡Wow!, promocionarán +1% Cubos por nivel hacia tu banco de Ascensión.
descriptions.138: [6x13] When you open Wow! Cubes you will get +0.1% Tributes per level!
descriptions.139: [6x14] Todos los edificios de Teseractos producen 2% más rápido por nivel.
descriptions.140: [6x15] The first of a tetralogy, this tome reduces the base requirements of Challenge 10 by dividing it by 1e100M! A must-read!
descriptions.141: [6x16] The Ant God has infiltrated your mind. Run away from your conscience! +0.8% Accelerators per level
descriptions.142: [6x17] Run... RUN FASTER from your nightmares! +0.8% Accelerator Boosts per level
descriptions.143: [6x18] Your resilience somehow gives you +0.8% Multipliers per level!
descriptions.144: [6x19] ¡Tus ganancias de Obtainium se incrementan un 3 * Log4(Fragmentos No Comunes +1) * nivel%! ¿Por qué? No sé.
descriptions.145: [6x20] Tus conocimientos de la guerra hormiga te ayudarán a ganar niveles de Mortuus Est automáticamente.
descriptions.146: [6x21] Feed your Disciples pure Obtainium to make them produce +0.4% Rune Power (to the first five runes) per level.
descriptions.147: [6x22] ¡Ceba a tus Hormigas sus propias migas para hacerlas Log(Migas + 10)x más rápidas!
descriptions.148: [6x23] ¡Aumenta tu ELO Hormiga base un 2,5% por nivel!
descriptions.149: [6x24] ¡Ganarás +0,03% más Ofrendas por nivel, por nivel del Talismán Midas!
descriptions.150: [6x25] Auto Challenge. Enough said. Lets you automatically run and complete Challenges!
descriptions.151: [7x1] A new row, old upgrade. Increase your Global Speed by +1.2% per level.
descriptions.152: [7x2] ¡Industrias ¡Wow! promociona otro +0,9% Cubos por nivel a tu banco de Ascensión!
descriptions.153: [7x3] Hey, I totally didn't steal this idea. You gain 12 Tributes of Wow! Cube tier for every Tesseract opened.
descriptions.154: [7x4] Make all Tesseract buildings produce 3% faster per level. Hey, isn't that more than the last Research tier?
descriptions.155: [7x5] Tomo 2 de 4: Como ganarse el universo Hormiga. Otro divisor e100 al Requerimiento Base del Desafío 10 al comprarlo.
descriptions.156: [7x6] What, again? Alright. +0.6% Accelerators per level.
descriptions.157: [7x7] Gas, gas, gas. +0.6% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.158: [7x8] Dupe DUPE DUPE. +0.6% Multipliers per level.
descriptions.159: [7x9] Somehow, I can't explain why, you reduce your Taxes by 2% multiplicative, based on 3/5 * log10(Rare Fragments)!
descriptions.160: [7x10] Want a permanent Blessing boost? I know you do. A permanent +25% Blessing Power increase.
descriptions.161: [7x11] SIGMA KAPPA: +0.3% Rune Power each level!
descriptions.162: [7x12] ¡Más exponenciación! ¡+0,0001% más poder de Inceptus por nivel!
descriptions.163: [7x13] Dios Hormiga busca sangre: +2% recompensas de Sacrificio Hormiga / nivel
descriptions.164: [7x14] Spirits suck, so add +8% Spirit Power per level!
descriptions.165: [7x15] Gain 2x Spirit Power in Ascension Challenges!
descriptions.166: [7x16] < T I M E >: +0.9% Global Speed per level.
descriptions.167: [7x17] Because of sponsorships, Wow! Industries is increasing Cubes gained in Ascension by 0.8% per level.
descriptions.168: [7x18] Gain +0.08% Tributes from Cubes per level. You know, you should expect it at this point.
descriptions.169: [7x19] +4% velocidad de Edificios Teseracto / nivel. Está CRECIENDO.
descriptions.170: [7x20] Tomo 3 de 4: Cómo destrozar el Desafío 10. ¡Divisor e100!
descriptions.171: [7x21] You should know how this goes. +0.4% Accelerators per level
descriptions.173: [7x23] Un montón de pequeños +0,4% Multiplicadores por nivel.
descriptions.174: [7x24] Epic Fragments boost Blessing Power by +10% * Log10(Epic Shards + 1)
descriptions.175: [7x25] Automatically buy Constant Upgrades, if they are affordable! They also no longer subtract from your Constant.
descriptions.176: [8x1] Row 8 baby! +0.2% Rune Power per level.
descriptions.177: [8x2] +Log10(Crumbs)% to Ant Speed per level. Pretty cool buff ain't it?
descriptions.178: [8x3] ¡+666 ELO base por nivel! Espeluznante número del diablo.
descriptions.179: [8x4] +0.04% more Offerings per level per Midas Talisman level!
descriptions.180: [8x5] +1 Quark Exportado por hora y nivel, de nuevo.
descriptions.181: [8x6] +0.6% Global Speed per level because why not? You're already the speed of light.
descriptions.182: [8x7] +0.7% Cubes in Ascension bank per level, from dividends in Wow! Stock.
descriptions.183: [8x8] ¡Al abrir un Hipercubo, también abres 100 Teseractos! (Funciona con 7x3, lo dejo caer.)
descriptions.184: [8x9] +5% faster Tesseract Buildings per level. ASCENDED.
descriptions.185: [8x10] Tome 4 of 4: How to Train your Ascendant. e100m divisor!
descriptions.186: [8x11] Something something +0.2% Accelerators per level... pretty cool!
descriptions.187: [8x12] Something somewhere, +0.2% Accelerator Boosts per level.
descriptions.188: [8x13] You are a DUPLICATE. +0.2% Multipliers per level
descriptions.189: [8x14] Legendary Fragments increase Spirit Power by +15% * Log10(Legendary Fragments + 1)
descriptions.190: [8x15] Desbloquea Automatizaciones para los cinco Edificios Teseracto.
descriptions.192: [8x17] Each purchased level of Mortuus Est (the Ant Upgrade) also increases Ascension Cube reward by +0.03%
descriptions.194: [8x19] Increases both Spirit Power AND Blessing Power by +2% per level.
descriptions.195: [8x20] ¡Gana +1 Quark al exportar por nivel, y aumenta el contador para reclamar Quarks 5 horas cada uno!
descriptions.196: [8x21] +0.3% Global Speed per level. Faster than the speed of light?
descriptions.197: [8x22] +0.6% Cubes in Ascension Bank per level. No one knows how. Bank error perhaps.
descriptions.198: [8x23] +0.06% Tributes from Cubes per level! Wow! Cubes really has a lot of manufacturing errors in your favor.
descriptions.199: [8x24] +10% faster Tesseract Buildings / level. THE ARISEN. WITH THE PRAISE OF THE [[REDACTED]].
descriptions.200: [8x25] Gain the power of a thousand suns! +0.01% Accelerators, A. Boosts, Multipliers, Offerings per level. +0.004% Cubes per level, +(level/200) free Ant upgrade levels, 0.000666% Tax reduction per level. Every 10,000 levels grant +0.4% more Talisman Power!

researches.thanksToResearches: Thanks to Research you automatically gain {{x}} Obtainium per real life second.
researches.hover: Hover over the grid to get details about Research!
researches.resets: Resets upon the next reset tier.

upgradeDescriptions.offeringPotion: ¡Gana instantáneamente 2 horas de tiempo real de Ofrendas, basándose en tu mejor Ofrendas/seg y velocidad global!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumPotion: ¡Gana instantáneamente 2 horas de tiempo real de Obtainium, basándose en tu mejor Obtainium/seg y velocidad global!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringAuto: Echa automáticamente Ofrendas en una runa. El 1er nivel desbloquea esto, y cada uno más incrementa las ganancias de Ofrendas un 2%. Cada segundo, se usa el equivalente en Ofrendas a 2^(nivel) niveles.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumAuto: Automatically pour Obtainium into a Research. 1st level unlocks feature, and each level increases Obtainium gain by 2%. Every Reincarnation, dump all Obtainium into Research until maxed.
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge: Desafíos de R y T no resetean al finalizar si reintento está activo y gana hasta 10 finalizaciones por tick. Además, gana instantáneamente Desafíos T hasta el máximo finalizado al salir de Desafíos R.
upgradeDescriptions.antSpeed: Each level gives a 1.2x speed multiplier to all Ant tiers' production! (Immaculate!) Short and simple.
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab: Esto es un timo para quedarse con tu dinero, pero ofrece un par de buenos stats. +1% producción por nivel a Ofrendas y Obtaimium.
upgradeDescriptions.shopTalisman: ¡Desbloquea permanentemente el Talismán de la Tienda!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass: Cubos ¡Wow! te proponen un trato: ¡Compra este totalmente justo Pase de Sesión y gana +2,25% Cubos y Teseractos por nivel al Acender!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeExtension: Usando un maravilloso truco, ¡logras incrementar tus máximos Desafíos de Reencarnación por 2 cada nivel!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome: La versión extendida: este quinto tomo olvidado te otorga un exponente de 20 millones de reducción en el requerimiento del desafió 10 por nivel. Pasadas las 60 Finalizaciones del desafió 9 o 10,esto también reducirá el factor creciente en 1% por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuark: ¿Pobres ganancias de Quarks por Cubos? Ok, compra esto por +50% Quarks abriendo Cubos ¡Wow!, ¡Para siempre!
upgradeDescriptions.tesseractToQuark: ¿Pobres ganancias de Quarks por Teseractos? Ok, compra esto por +50% Quarks abriendo Teseractos ¡Wow!, ¡Para siempre!
upgradeDescriptions.hypercubeToQuark: ¿Pobres ganancias de Quarks por Hipercubos? Ok, compra esto por +50% Quarks abriendo Hipercubos ¡Wow!, ¡Para siempre!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass2: ¡Especulando por cinco se disfruta el doble! +1,5% Hipercubos ¡Wow! y Cubos Platónicos por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass3: Ok, esto es ridículo. ¡+1,5% Hepteractos y Octeractos ¡Wow! por nivel!
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer: ¿Sabes qué? Las Ascensiones son un poco lentas. ¿Por qué no darte un +1,2% velocidad al contador por nivel?
upgradeDescriptions.infiniteAscent: Ok, por una suma exorbitante, ¡puedes tener la 6a runa, que te da +35% Quarks y +125% a todos los tipos de Cubos al maximizarla!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator: El PL-AT puede sumar en un parpadeo. No mucho más tampoco. ¡+14% Quarks al usar el código 'add' por nivel, el primer nivel te da la respuesta y el último te lo hace automáticamente!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator2: El PL-AT X tiene mejorada capacidad de memoria, permitiéndote guardar 2 usos adicionales de 'add' por nivel. ¡El último nivel hace que te den 25% más Quarks por 'add'!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator3:
El PL-AT Ω esta infundido con algo de inobtanium,el cual es épico!
Ademas,reduce la variante de quarks del código 'add' en 10% por nivel,lo que hace mas probable de que consigas el multiplicador máximo. También tiene la habilidad de darte +60 segundos a tu tiempo de Ascencion usando ese código.
upgradeDescriptions.calculator4: The PL-AT δ runs at 4,096Hz, which is a huge improvement over previous models. Reduce the interval between 'Add' code uses by 4% per level! Final level adds 32 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator5: El modelo PL-AT Γ  hace de alguna manera computaciones más 'poderosas', no preguntes. +6 segundos de Exportación al cronómetro de QD por nivel. ¡+1 de capacidad cada 10 niveles, y 6 más al último!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator6: El modelo PL-AT _ fue creado por Derpsmith, antes de desaparecer del negocio para siempre. Gana 1 segundo de Octeracto por uso por nivel. ¡El último te da 24 más de capacidad!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator7: The PL-AT ΩΩ model was made by Derpsmith Ω, before he was banished from the industry forever. Gain 1 real-life second of Ambrosia Bar Points per usage per level. Final level grants 48 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.constantEX: El mercader tiene un último as bajo la manga: puede aumentar marginalmente la segunda mejora de constante, ¿pero te costará un ojo de la cara! En vez de un límite de 10% (11% con logros) lo aumenta un 1% por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.powderEX: El mismo Platonic te da un ratio de conversión de Orbes a Polvo 2% mejor por nivel. Se activa al expirar los Orbes.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer2: Está bien, lo que digas. Otro +0,6% Velocidad de Ascensión por nivel, ¡Se acumula multiplicativamente con la primera mejora!
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer3: ESTÁ BIEN. LO QUE DIGAS. OTRO +1,5% Velocidad de Ascensión por nivel, acumulándose multiplicativamente como siempre.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassY: Esto es aún más loco que el último, pero lo comprarás igualmente. +0,75% a TODOS los Cubos por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassZ: Este es debatiblemente muy bueno. ¡Gana +1% de TODOS los Cubos por nivel, por singularidad!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome2: Encuentras las últimas páginas del tomo perdido. Funcionalmente es lo mismo que las otras páginas, ¡pero puedes tener hasta cinco más!
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge2: Finalizar un Desafío de Ascensión no hará que resetees (si reintento está activo) y ganas 1 finalización más por tick por Singularidad.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuarkAll: El primero del menú, ¿por qué no ganar +0,2% Quarks al abrir Cubos por nivel?
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab2: Esto no es ni siquiera tan bueno como el original. +0,5% Ofrendas y Obtainium por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerZ: Gana +0,1% Velocidad de Ascensión por nivel y Singularidad. Necesita mucho combustible para ponerse en marcha.
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX2: Gana +1% Ofrendas por nivel por Singularidad. Llevando a la quiebra al mercado de Sanciones en Singularidad.
upgradeDescriptions.powderAuto: Tus abuelos tenían que esperar un día entero para polvo, ¡Pero tú no! Gana +1% del polvo que hubieras ganado por orbes y el factor de conversión, por nivel
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassLost: Se le aconsejaría no tocar esto. +0,1% Octeractos por nivel, lo que sea que sean...
upgradeDescriptions.challenge15Auto: Tus abuelos tenían que saltar dimensiones para ganar puntuación de Desafío 15, ¡Pero tú no! ¡Actualiza el Exponente de Desafío 15 cada tick mientras estés dentro!
upgradeDescriptions.extraWarp: "Hey tío, métete en este portal que creé anoche en mi choza!" dijo el Mercader Quack
upgradeDescriptions.autoWarp: Con el poder de la máquina de Deformación Quack ahora podrás ir al máximo
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept: After 1,000 Quark Hepts, you gain +20% more Quarks every doubling! This, however, raises the entire reward by +0.01 power per level!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept2: Want even stronger Quark Hepts? Gain +0.01 power per level to the Quark Hept Exponent!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept3: You are probably asking why I would sell this to you instead of using it for myself. Well... here's +0.01 power per level!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept4: +0.01 power per level... You know that 10^0.01 is about 1.023, right?
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily: ¡Tú! ¡Sí, tú! Los Quarks ponen al mercader foca contento. Obtén +5% del código 'daily' por nivel.
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily2: ¡Obtén 1 Mejora Singularidad adicional gratis y 20% más de Quarks Dorados por uso de 'daily' por nivel!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily3: ¡Obtén 1 Mejora Singularidad adicional gratis y 15% más de Quarks Dorados por uso de 'daily' por nivel!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily4: ¡Obtén 1 Mejora Singularidad adicional gratis y 100% más de Quarks Dorados por uso de 'daily' por nivel!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX3: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more Offerings per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). Every 25 levels, gain +1 Base Offering!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX3: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more Obtainium per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). Every 25 levels, gain 6% more Immaculate Obtainium Multiplier! (1.06^[level/25])
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerInfinity: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 0.6% more Ascension Speed per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.006^level). Every 40 levels, gain +0.001 spread on Ascension Speed exponent modifiers on speeds greater than or less than 1 (Check Stats for Nerds for this one)!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassInfinity: [Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Gain 1.2% more cubes per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.012^level). This effect is raised to the power of 1.25 for Octeract calculations!
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPenaltyDebuff: Derpsmith está tan orgulloso de tu rendimiento en el primer EXALT que quiere reducir tus penalizaciones de singularidad. Por un precio. Un gran precio.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept5: [NOT Supplied by - Infinity CO.] Adds +0.01 Quark Hept Exponent per level. Platonic claims this is not from Infinity CO., but that might just be a cover.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration1: Buying this charm grants +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration2: Newly fortified Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, giving +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration3: It turns out adding more Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, go figure. +1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration4: What if you also added Quark Dust??? You will find out. +0.1% more Ambrosia Bar Points per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck1: Buying this charm grants +2 Ambrosia luck per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck2: You get a slightly larger four leaf clover, giving +2 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck3: You get a slightly greener four leaf clover, giving +2 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck4: You get a slightly 'better' four leaf clover, what ever that means, giving +0.6 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck1: A small, lesser dice from the tactician of gambling himself. +0.05 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck2: This one seems to have a heavy side. I wonder what that is about. +0.075 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopRedLuck3: When you pick up this dice, it phases out of existence, then returns, the six face-up. +0.1 Red Luck per level. Every 20 levels, reduce the conversion ratio of Ambrosia Luck to Red Luck by 0.01.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuckMultiplier4: Gain +1% Ambrosia Luck per level! Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopOcteractAmbrosiaLuck: Gain +1 Ambrosia Luck per digit in your Wow! Octeract inventory per level. Simple as that.
upgradeDescriptions.shopCashGrabUltra: For a nominal price, gain up to +15% Ambrosia Bar Points, +120% Cubes and +8% Quarks per level based on Ambrosia, scaling nonlinearly until 10,000,000 lifetime earned.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaAccelerator: For each level of this Accelerator, reduce Ambrosia Bar Point requirements for Ambrosia generation by 0.4% per completion of EXALT 5 - No Ambrosia Upgrades.
upgradeDescriptions.shopEXUltra: With this EX Upgrade, every 1,000 owned Ambrosia adds +0.1% <<orchid|Obtainium>>, <<orange|Offerings>> and <<white|Cubes>>! This effect caps at 125,000 * (level of shop upgrade)!
upgradeDescriptions.shopChronometerS: With this upgrade, you gain +1% Ascension Speed and Global Speed per Singularity number above 200 your Singularity takes place!
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaUltra: For this absurdly expensive EX Upgrade, every EXALT completion grants +1 permanent Ambrosia Luck, per level.
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularitySpeedup: You know all those time-gated Singularity and Octeract Upgrades? Now they accumulate 50 times faster! Thanks to this weird clock that somehow alters even <<gray | Singular Time>>...
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPotency: You know all those free Singularity Upgrades? They are now 266% more effective (so, each is worth the equivalent to 3.66 levels, before softcaps). Why? This kinda weird <<gray | Singularity Transmission Ritual Device>>! Don't question it.
upgradeDescriptions.shopSadisticRune: What a weird rune; The shopkeeper (who you know no longer can see) says telepathically that it is an Infinite Ascent rune drenched in some <<gray | Singularity Matter>>. Were there other Ascents? Or maybe a <<gray | Descent?>>
upgradeDescriptions.shopInfiniteShopUpgrades: A Shop Voucher, printed on a blue tablet. Each grants +0.005 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark shop upgrades, multiplied by the sum of your EXALT completions, all rounded down.
upgradeDescriptions.shopHorseShoe: Horse Shoes make good protection! Add 3 free levels of Horse Shoe rune, and each level of Horse Shoe rune decreases effects of Singularity Debuffs (except Salvage) by 0.1% per level additive (Max -30%)!

shop.header: Bienvenido a la Tienda de Quarks ¡No creerás lo que tenemos!
shop.refundable: This item is refundable! Will be set to level {{level}} when refunded.
