irishAnt2.default: Ants blessed with more fortunate luck of the Irish increase base <<limegreen|Ambrosia Luck>> by <<limegreen|{{percent}}%>>! <<limegreen|+1%>> per perk level.

overclocked.name: Overclocked
overclocked.default: Level Caps on Certain Singularity Upgrades are increased by {{i}}!

wowCubeAutomatedShipping.name: Wow! Cube Automated Shipping
wowCubeAutomatedShipping.hasLevel1: ¡Compra automáticamente Mejoras de Cubos cada ascensión, sin importar dónde estés!
wowCubeAutomatedShipping.default: Compra automáticamente Mejoras de Cubos cada ascensión, solo si estás en un Desafío de Singularidad.

congealedblueberries.name: Congealed Blueberries
congealedblueberries.default: Semisolid Blueberries act like normal Blueberries. Gain +{{i}} Blueberries which may be used in the Blueberry tree!

goldenRevolution.name: Golden Revolution
goldenRevolution.default: Singularity grants 0.4% more Golden Quarks per Singularity. Currently: +{{current}}% (MAX: +100%)

goldenRevolutionII.name: Golden Revolution II
goldenRevolutionII.default: Golden Quarks are 0.2% cheaper per Singularity. Currently: -{{current}}% (MAX: -50%)

goldenRevolutionIII.name: Golden Revolution III
goldenRevolutionIII.default: Export gives 2% more Golden Quarks per Singularity. Currently: +{{current}}% (MAX: +500%)

platonicClones.name: Clones of Platonic Clicking at Your Desktop
platonicClones.hasLevel1: ¡Compra automáticamente Mejoras Platónicas cada ascensión, sin gastar Obtainium u Ofrendas, en cualquier parte!
platonicClones.default: Compra automáticamente Mejoras Platónicas cada ascensión, sin gastar Obtainium u Ofrendas, pero solo en Desafíos de Singularidad.

platSigma.name: PL-AT Σ
platSigma.default: The 'Add' Special Action refills {{counter}}% faster per level per Singularity. Currently: {{current}} (MAX: -60% Cooldown)

midasMilleniumAgedGold.name: Midas' Millennium-Aged Gold
midasMilleniumAgedGold.default: Every use of the 'Add' Special Action gives 0.01 free levels of GQ1 and 0.05 free levels of GQ3.

goldenRevolution4.name: Golden Revolution IV
goldenRevolution4.default: Every Octeract tick, convert 1 in {{gq}} GQ you would gain in this singularity to your balance automagically!

octeractMetagenesis.name: Octeract Metagenesis
octeractMetagenesis.hasLevel1: Gives free levels of Octeract Cogenesis AND Trigenesis based on your current free levels and purchased levels: (level * free / 640)^0.5, (level^2 * free/125000)^0.333 respectively
octeractMetagenesis.default: Gives free levels of Octeract Cogenesis based on your current free levels and purchased levels: (level * free / 1000)^0.5

immaculateAlchemy.name: Immaculate Alchemy
immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel2: Tras la Singularidad 200, ¡El Rebobinado Hacia Delante ya no funciona! En su lugar, multiplica tus ganancia de QD y divide el costo de comprarlos por 8.
immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel1: Tras la Singularidad 200, ¡El Rebobinado Hacia Delante ya no funciona! En su lugar, multiplica tus ganancia de QD y divide el costo de comprarlos por 5.
immaculateAlchemy.default:
Multiply Golden Quark gain and divide the cost to buy Golden Quarks by {{ multiplier }}!
This perk takes into account your current, not highest Singularity!
Thresholds: s50, s90, s130, s170, s200, s217, s235, s253, s271, s289

skrauQ.name: skrauQ
skrauQ.default:
Multiply all Quark Gain by (1 + (Singularity - 199)/25)^2. Currently: <>... Yes, it's <>.
<> This Perk takes into account your current Singularity count, and not your highest!

primalPower.name: Primal Power!
primalPower.hasLevel1: Gain awesome power by reaching Prime Numbered Singularities! Currently gaining: <<limegreen|+131>> & <<limegreen|+269 Ambrosia Luck>>!
primalPower.default: Gain awesome power by reaching Prime Numbered Singularities! Currently gaining: <<limegreen|+131 Ambrosia Luck>>!

permanentBenefaction.name: Permanent Benefaction
permanentBenefaction.default: <<lightblue | Pandora>> and <<orange | Vyshareth>> will always grant you their benefaction, so their cookies are correspondingly always eaten!

infiniteShopUpgrades.name: Orange Infinity Shop Voucher
infiniteShopUpgrades.default: Gain +0.5 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades per highest Singularity, minus 200, rounded down! Currently: {{amt}}
infiniteShopUpgrades.level2: Gain +0.8 effective levels of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades per highest Singularity, minus 200, rounded down! Currently: {{amt}}

recycledContent.name: ... Recycled Content?
recycledContent.default: Increase your <<green|Salvage>> by 5 per tier! Currently: +{{amount}}

infiniteRecycling.name: Infinite Recycling
infiniteRecycling.default: Your Infinite Ascent Rune gains a third perk: +0.025 <<green|Salvage>> per level, per tier! Currently: +{{salvage}}

recyclistsDesktop.name: Recyclists Clicking at Your Desktop
recyclistsDesktop.default: For all sources of <<crimson|Negative Salvage>>, they reduce it by {{i}}% less!

demeterHarvest.name: Demeter's Harvest
demeterHarvest.default: For all sources of <<lime|Positive Salvage>>, they increase it by {{i}}% more!

toString.noMinimum: No requiere Singularidad mínima para comprar
toString.costNextLevel: Cost for next level: {{amount}} Golden Quarks

goldenQuarks1.name: Quarks Dorados I
goldenQuarks1.description: A futuro, ¡Ganarás 10% más Quarks Dorados en Singularidades por nivel!
goldenQuarks1.effect: Permanently gain {{n}} more Golden Quarks on Singularities.

goldenQuarks2.name: Quarks Dorados II
goldenQuarks2.description: ¡Comprar QD es 0,2% más barato por nivel! [Tras 50%, el efecto sube mucho más lento]
goldenQuarks2.effect: Comprar Quarks Dorados en la tienda es {{n}}% más barato.

goldenQuarks3.name: Quarks Dorados III
goldenQuarks3.description: Si compras esto, ganarás Quarks Dorados por hora de las Exportaciones. ¡Subir de nivel da (nivel) adicionales por hora!
goldenQuarks3.effect: Cada hora, ganas {{n}} Quarks Dorados Exportando.

starterPack.name: Paquete de inicio
starterPack.description: Buy this! Buy This! Cube gain is permanently multiplied by 5, and gain 6x the Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings from all sources.
starterPack.effectHave: You have unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings.
starterPack.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings.

wowPass.name: Bonanza de la tienda
wowPass.description: This upgrade will convince the Seal Merchant to sell you more cool stuff, which even persist on Singularity!
wowPass.effectHave: Has desbloqueado la Bonanza de Tienda.
wowPass.effectHaveNot: No has desbloqueado la Bonanza de Tienda.

cookies.name: Receta de galletas I
cookies.description: Por solo unos pocos Quarks Dorados, reabre las Pastelerías ¡Wow!, añadiendo cinco mejoras de Cubos relacionadas con galletas.
cookies.effectHave: Has desbloqueado el volumen 1 del libro de recetas.
cookies.effectHaveNot: No has desbloqueado el volumen 2 del libro de recetas.

cookies2.name: Receta de Galletas II
cookies2.description: Diversifica las Pastelerías ¡Wow! para crear galletas algo más exóticas, añadiendo cinco mejoras de Cubos relacionadas con galletas.
cookies2.effectHave: Has desbloqueado el volumen 2 del libro de recetas.
cookies2.effectHaveNot: No has desbloqueado el volumen 2 del libro de recetas.

cookies3.name: Receta de Galletas III
cookies3.description: Your bakers threaten to quit without a higher pay. If you do pay them, they will bake even more fancy cookies.
cookies3.effectHave: Has aplacado al sindicato de Pasteleros.
cookies3.effectHaveNot: No has aplacado al sindicato de Pasteleros.

cookies4.name: Receta de Galletas IV
cookies4.description: Este es un pequeño precio a pagar por la Salvación.
cookies4.effectHave: Has pagado el precio por salvarte.
cookies4.effectHaveNot: No has pagado el precio por salvarte.

cookies5.name: Cookie Recipes V
cookies5.description: La peor atrocidad que puede acometer el hombre es ver, sin empatía, el sufrimiento de otros.
cookies5.effectHave: Has sido testigo del sufrimiento de las masas.
cookies5.effectHaveNot: No has sido testigo del sufrimiento de las masas.

ascensions.name: Ganancias de Ascensión mejoradas
ascensions.description: Comprando esto, ganas +2% Conteo de Ascensiones para siempre, ¡por nivel! Cada 10 niveles da un ascenso adicional, multiplicativo, de +1%.

corruptionFourteen.name: Corrupciones de Nivel Catorce
corruptionFourteen.description: Buy this to unlock level fourteen Corruptions. :)
corruptionFourteen.effectHave: You have gained the ability to use level 14 Corruptions. {{m}}
corruptionFourteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained the ability to use level 14 Corruptions. {{m}}

corruptionFifteen.name: Corrupciones de Nivel Quince
corruptionFifteen.description: This doesn't *really* raise the Corruption limit. Rather, it adds one FREE level to Corruption multipliers, no matter what (can exceed cap). :)
corruptionFifteen.effectHave: You have gained a free Corruption level. {{m}}
corruptionFifteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained a free Corruption level. {{m}}

singOfferings1.name: Carga de Ofrendas
singOfferings1.description: Mejora esto para ganar +2% Ofrendas por nivel, ¡Para siempre!

singOfferings2.name: Tormenta de Ofrendas
singOfferings2.description: Parece ser que puedes usar esta barra para atraer más ofrendas. +8% por nivel, siendo precisos.

singOfferings3.name: Tempestad de Ofrendas
singOfferings3.description: This bar is so pristine, it'll make anyone submit their Offerings. +4% per level, to be precise.

singObtainium1.name: Ola de Obtainium
singObtainium1.description: Mejora esto para ganar +2% Obtanium por nivel, ¡Para siempre!

singObtainium2.name: Inundación de Obtainium
singObtainium2.description: Santa Vaca, ¡manejo del Agua! +8% Obtainium ganado por nivel.

singObtainium3.name: Tsunami de Obtainium
singObtainium3.description: La marea creciente se lleva los botes. +4% Obtainium ganado por nivel.

singCubes1.name: Llama de Cubos
singCubes1.description: Upgrade this to get +0.6% Cubes per level, forever!

singCubes2.name: Llamarada de Cubos
singCubes2.description: ¡Quema algunos Quarks Dorados más! +8% Cubos ganados por nivel.

singCubes3.name: Infierno de Cubos
singCubes3.description: Hasta Dante está impresionado. +4% Cubos ganados por nivel.

singCitadel.name: Ciudadela de la Singularidad
singCitadel.description: What a unique structural phenomenon... but it gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels!

singCitadel2.name: Ciudadela de la 'Singularidad': La Verdadera
singCitadel2.description: ¡Esta ciudadela de verdad te da +2% Obtainium, Ofrendas, y cubos 3-7D por nivel! ¡+1% Adicional cada 10 niveles! Y da niveles gratis a la falsa al nivel de esta.

octeractUnlock.name: Octeractos
octeractUnlock.effectHave: Te has tragado el hype de los Octeractos.
octeractUnlock.effectHaveNot: No te has tragado el hype de los Octeractos.

singOcteractPatreonBonus.name: ¡¡¡Platonic $e Vende!!!
singOcteractPatreonBonus.description: ¿Sabes del bonus de Patreon? Está bien y tal, ¿pero qué pasaría si también aumentara la producción de Octeractos por la misma cantidad?
singOcteractPatreonBonus.effect: Octeract production is {{n}} faster for every $10 per month on the Patreon! Same as the Quark bonus which already exists.

offeringAutomatic.name: Blueberry Shards!
offeringAutomatic.description:
Las leyendas son ciertas.
Las Profecías se han cumplido.
Dios Hormiga ha oído tus plegarias.
¡Que haya Arándanos!
Y eran buenos.

intermediatePack.name: Pack Intermedio
intermediatePack.description: Double Global Speed, Multiply Ascension Speed by 1.5, and gain +2% Quarks forever. Yum... 2% Quark Milk.
intermediatePack.effectHave: Has mejorado el paquete a intermedio.
intermediatePack.effectHaveNot: No has mejorado el paquete a intermedio.

advancedPack.name: Pack Avanzado
advancedPack.description: Now we're cooking with kerosene! Gain +4% Quarks, additive with intermediate pack, +0.33 to all Corruption score multipliers, regardless of level!
advancedPack.effectHaveNot: No has comprado nuestro paquete avanzado.

expertPack.name: Pack Experto
expertPack.description: That's a handful! Gain +6% Quarks, additive with other packs, 1.5x Ascension Score, Code 'add' gives 1.2x Ascension Timer.
expertPack.effectHaveNot: No has cambiado al proveedor experto.

masterPack.name: Pack Maestro
masterPack.description: A tad insane. Gain +8% Quarks, additive with other packs, for every level 14 Corruption, Ascension Score is multiplied by 1.1.
masterPack.effectHaveNot: No has domando tus chakras internos.

divinePack.name: Pack Divino
divinePack.description: OHHHHH. Gain +10% Quarks, additive with other packs, and multiply Octeract gain by 1.25 for each Corruption at level 14 or higher (1.3 for >=15 and 1.4 for >=16)!
divinePack.effectHave: You have found the reason for existence. Current Octeract Bonus: +{{n}}
divinePack.effectHaveNot: No has encontrado la razón de tu existencia.

wowPass2.name: Ventas por Liquidación.
wowPass2.description: El Mercader Foca necesita deshacerse de bienes exóticos. Por un precio disparatado. No creo que sea así como funcionan las ventas.

wowPass3.name: QUAAAACK
wowPass3.description: QUAAAAAAAACK. ¡El Mercader se ha vuelto loco por tus QUARKS!

potionBuff.name: Decantador de Pociones de la Iluminación.
potionBuff.description: ¡Hecho para ser la fuente de la juventud, esta cosa empodera las pociones considerablemente!

potionBuff2.name: Decantador de Pociones de la Inquisición.
potionBuff2.description: Mirando el vaso, no estás seguro de lo que es esta poción.

potionBuff3.name: Decantador de Pociones de loca inestabilidad.
potionBuff3.description: SHE'S GONNA BLOW!!!! Said Midas, the Golden Quark Salesman.

singChallengeExtension.name: Mayores Límites de Desafíos
singChallengeExtension.description: ¿Quieres más Desafíos? Bien, aumenta en 2 el límite de los Desafíos de Reencarnación y 1 de Ascensión, por nivel.
singChallengeExtension.effect: Te sientes lo bastante motivado para completar {{n}} más Desafíos de Reencarnación, y {{m}} de Ascensión.

singChallengeExtension2.name: Más Mayores Límites de Desafíos
singChallengeExtension2.description: ¿Quieres aún más Desafíos? Bien, aumenta en 2 el límite de los Desafíos de Reencarnación y 1 de Ascensión, por nivel.
singChallengeExtension2.effect: Te sientes lo bastante motivado para completar {{n}} más Desafíos de Reencarnación, y {{m}} de Ascensión.

singChallengeExtension3.name: Los Más Mayores Límites de Desafíos
singChallengeExtension3.description: ¿Quieres aún MÁS Desafíos? Bien, aumenta en 2 el límite de los Desafíos de Reencarnación y 1 de Ascensión, por nivel. No debe ser sano.
singChallengeExtension3.effect: Te sientes lo bastante motivado para completar {{n}} más Desafíos de Reencarnación, y {{m}} de Ascensión.

singQuarkImprover1.name: Coso Apenas Mejorador de Ganancia de Quarks
singQuarkImprover1.description: A doohickey that I forgot what it looked like. +0.5% Quarks per level, multiplicative with all other bonuses! Seems like it grows in cost a lot faster than anything else though. Also, did you know these descriptions can be arbitrarily long?

singQuarkHepteract.name: Desearía que mi Hepteracto de Quarks fuera marginalmente mejor.
singQuarkHepteract.description: Wrong game, oops. Anyway, would you like more exponent on your Quark Hepteract. +0.02 per level, to be precise.

singQuarkHepteract2.name: Desearía que mi Hepteracto de Quarks fuera marginalmente mejor II.
singQuarkHepteract2.description: Aún no es el correcto. Igual que la anterior mejora.

singQuarkHepteract3.name: Desearía que mi Hepteracto de Quarks fuera marginalmente mejor III.
singQuarkHepteract3.description: I AM NOT THE GODMOTHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR! This wish is weaker... but it can be overclocked.

singOcteractGain.name: Absenta de Octeractos
singOcteractGain.description: ¡Nunca imaginarías que este tónico potencia tus Octeractos! [¡+1.25% por nivel, de hecho!]

singOcteractGain2.name: Reales de a Ocho
singOcteractGain2.description: Hay de hecho ocho de ellos, pero cada uno da +0,625% bonus, así que cada nivel da +5% Octeractos por nivel.

singOcteractGain3.name: El Obelisco con Forma de Octógono.
singOcteractGain3.description: Platonic ha tenido que llegar lejos con esto. ¡+2.5% Octeractos, sí!

singOcteractGain5.name: La Octava Maravilla del Mundo
singOcteractGain5.description: is the wonder of the world we live in. +1% Octeracts per level.

platonicTau.name: TAU Platónico
platonicTau.description: Localizado en la sección incorrecta de mejoras, ¡quita las restricciones de corrupciones o topes de corrupción! ¡Y aumenta la ganancia de cubos 3d a potencia de 1.01!
platonicTau.effectHaveNot: Esta mejora no se ha comprado

platonicAlpha.name: ¡ALPHA Platónico...?
platonicAlpha.description: Hay confusión en por qué hay dos de estos. ¡Este está capitalizado, asegurando que Alfa Platónico está siempre al máximo!
platonicAlpha.effectHaveNot: Esta mejora no se ha comprado

platonicDelta.name: DELTA Platónico
platonicDelta.description: Time follows you towards the future, after getting this bad boy. Gain +100% more Cubes per day in your current singularity, up to +900% at day 9.
platonicDelta.effectHaveNot: Esta mejora no se ha comprado

platonicPhi.name: PHI Platónico
platonicPhi.description: Time follows you toward the past as well. Gain 5 additional free Singularity Upgrades per day in your singularity from code 'daily', up to +50 after 10 days.
platonicPhi.effectHaveNot: Esta mejora no se ha comprado

singFastForward.name: Singularidades de Éterflujo
singFastForward.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 2.5% (additive), and lets you 'look ahead' an extra Singularity. This means you can choose (from the Elevator) to skip a Singularity if you do one at your all time highest!

singFastForward2.name: Singularidades de Aéterflujo
singFastForward2.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 2.5% (additive) and lets you 'look ahead' yet another Singularity!

singAscensionSpeed.name: A hecking good Ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed.description: La Velocidad de Ascensión aumenta a potencia de 1,03, aumentada a 0,97 si es menor de 1x.

singAscensionSpeed2.name: Ascended Ascension Speedup!
singAscensionSpeed2.description: The first upgrade gave 0.03 of what we in the business call 'exponent spread'. This adds +0.001 per level!

ultimatePen.name: El Bolígrafo Final
ultimatePen.description: Tú. ¡Eres tú el autor de su propia historia!

halfMind.name: HALF MIND
halfMind.description: A note, you found on the 'ground': seems like an advertisement for a cult. "Lock your global speed to 10x, and multiply all obtainium and offerings based on the difference." Hmm...

oneMind.name: UNA MENTE
oneMind.description: The Cult Master, in his third eye, stares into your brain. "Hmm. You need the other half. For a heavy tithe, let me extend the benefits of the MIND to your Ascension Speed for Cubes as well." Hmm indeed...

wowPass4.name: QUQUQUQUAAKCKCKKCKKCKK
wowPass4.description: ¡Tratos que te costarán un pico y un ala!
wowPass4.effectHaveNot: No has cuacado tu último QUARK

blueberries.name: Blueberries!
blueberries.description: Blueberries! They are rich in Vitamin K, which helps clot things, including Ambrosia!

singAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Gilded Berries of Good Fortune
singAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Literally put some gold onto 'berries' and become lucky. +2 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Dedicated Gold Smelting
singAmbrosiaLuck3.description: More gold is dipped onto each berry. +3 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaLuck.name: Absolutamente caliente
singAmbrosiaLuck.description: Your gold smelters get arbitrarily close to 'Absolute Hot'. +4 Ambrosia Luck per level, infinitely levelable!

singAmbrosiaLuck4.name: Los Alquimistas del Inicio del Juego Trabajan Duro por tus Bayas Doradas
singAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Yeah, these upgrade titles can be arbitrarily long, too. +5 Ambrosia Luck per level!

singAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Reloj de Arena de Importancia
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat important hourglass which somehow grants +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level...
singAmbrosiaGeneration2.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Reloj de Arena de Significación
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still important, perhaps even more so. +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
singAmbrosiaGeneration3.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Reloj de Arena sin Límites
singAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Remember- this hourglass is really important. But it gives +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level and is infinitely levelable!
singAmbrosiaGeneration.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Reloj de Arena de Fantasía
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is unimportant and 'less timely'- whatever that means. +2% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
singAmbrosiaGeneration4.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

singBonusTokens1.name: Spare Change on the Sofa Cushion
singBonusTokens1.description: Thanks to your perceptive eyes, you find more Tokens in Campaigns! +1 per level per Campaign with at least 1 completion.
singBonusTokens1.effect: You find {{n}} more Tokens from first clears in Campaigns!

singBonusTokens2.name: Spare Change in the creases of the Sofa Cushions
singBonusTokens2.description: Thanks to your more perceptive eyes, you find even more Tokens in Campaigns! +1% more Tokens per level from Campaigns.
singBonusTokens2.effect: You find +{{n}}% more Tokens from Campaigns!

singBonusTokens3.name: Spare Change under the Sofa
singBonusTokens3.description: Why do you have Tokens just lying everywhere near your Sofa? +2 per level per Campaign with maxxed completions.
singBonusTokens3.effect: You find {{n}} more Tokens from maxxed Campaigns!

singBonusTokens4.name: Spare Change from the Ant God's Coffers
singBonusTokens4.description: Those Tokens were too big to be called Tokens. Too big, too thick, too heavy, and too rough, they were more like large hunks of gold. +5 Tokens at the start of a Singularity per level.
singBonusTokens4.effect: Ant God ponies up {{n}} Tokens at the start of a Singularity!

singInfiniteShopUpgrades.name: Yellow Infinity Shop Voucher
singInfiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a yellow tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
singInfiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{n}} Yellow Infinity Shop Vouchers!

singTalismanBonusRunes1.name: Talisman Buff!
singTalismanBonusRunes1.description: Gain +1% Talisman Power per level, additive to other bonuses.
singTalismanBonusRunes1.effect: {{n}}% more bonus Rune Levels from Talismans!

singTalismanBonusRunes2.name: Talisman Buff! The second
singTalismanBonusRunes2.description: Gain +1% more Talisman Power per level, additive to other bonuses.
singTalismanBonusRunes2.effect: {{n}}% more bonus Rune Levels from Talismans!

singTalismanBonusRunes3.name: Talisman Buff! The third
singTalismanBonusRunes3.description: Gain +1% more Talisman Power per level again, additive to other bonuses.
singTalismanBonusRunes3.effect: {{n}}% more bonus Rune Levels from Talismans!

singTalismanBonusRunes4.name: Talisman Buff! The fourth
singTalismanBonusRunes4.description: Gain +1% more Talisman Power per level again, AGAIN, additive to other bonuses. Instead of adding five upgrades, Platonic gave this one twice as many levels. Game design!
singTalismanBonusRunes4.effect: {{n}}% more bonus Rune Levels from Talismans!

penalties.ascensionSpeed: <<orange|La Velocidad de Ascensión>> se divide por <<orange|{{divisor}}>>.
penalties.offeringGain: <<gold|La Ganancia de Ofrendas>> se divide por <<gold|{{divisor}}>>.
penalties.obtainiumGain: <<steelblue|La Ganancia de Obtainium>> se divide por <<steelblue|{{divisor}}>>.
penalties.cubeGain: <<yellow|La Ganancia de Cubos>> se divide por <<yellow|{{divisor}}>>.
penalties.cubeUpgradeCosts: <<Silver|Costes de Mejoras de Cubos>> (Menos Galletas) se multiplican por <<Silver|{{multiplier}}>>.
penalties.platonicCosts: <<var(--orchid-text-color)|Costes de Mejoras Platónicas>> se multiplican por <<var(--orchid-text-color)|{{multiplier}}>>.
penalties.hepteractCosts: <<Pink|Costes de Forja de Hepteractos>> se multiplican por <<Pink|{{multiplier}}>>.
penalties.penaltySmooth: Ya no experimentarás picos repentinos en penalizaciones.
penalties.penaltyRough: Tus penalizaciones empeorarán mucho en la <<var(--red-text-color)|Singularidad {{num}}>>.
penalties.antiquitiesNotBought: <<var(--red-text-color)|¡Las Penalizaciones siguen activas porque no has subido de nivel las Antiguedades del Dios Hormiga!>>

elevator.title: Singularity Elevator
elevator.description:
<>
You may choose any Singularity from Singularity 1 to {{limit}}
elevator.lockEnabled: Future Singularities are <<orange|LOCKED>>. You will repeat <<gold | Singularity {{target}}>>.
elevator.lockDisabledSing: Your next Singularity will be <<gold | Singularity {{target}}>>
elevator.invalidTarget: Please select a valid Singularity between 1 and {{max}}.
elevator.noTarget: Please select a target Singularity first.

descriptions.1: Aumenta la producción de Trabajadores por productor comprado.
descriptions.2: Aumenta la producción de Inversiones por productor comprado.

descriptions.9: Gana 1 multiplicador Gratuito por cada 10 Aceleradores comprados.

descriptions.19: Multiplica la producción de Inversiones en base a Mythos.
descriptions.20: La mejora de Moneda 1 se aumenta a la undécima potencia.
descriptions.21: Gana 1 Multiplicador y 5 Aceleradores y 1% más Multiplicadores/Aceleradores gratuitos.
descriptions.22: Gana 1 Multiplicador y 4 Aceleradores y 1% más Multiplicadores/Aceleradores gratuitos.
descriptions.23: Gana 1 Multiplicador y 3 Aceleradores y 1% más Multiplicadores/Aceleradores gratuitos.
descriptions.24: Gana 1 Multiplicador y 2 Aceleradores y 1% más Multiplicadores/Aceleradores gratuitos.
descriptions.25: Gana 1 Multiplicador y 1 Acelerador y 1% más Multiplicadores/Aceleradores gratuitos.
descriptions.26: Gana un Potenciador de Aceleración gratuito.
descriptions.27: Gain free levels of Speed Rune based on unspent Coins. (Max: +100)
descriptions.28: Gain a free level of Duplication Rune per 400 Coin producers bought. (Max: +100)
descriptions.29: Gain a free level of Speed Rune per 400 Coin producers bought. (Max: +100)
descriptions.30: Gain free levels of Duplication Rune based on unspent Coins. (Max: +100)
descriptions.31: Gana 1 Potenciador de Acelerador gratuito por cada 2.000 productores comprados.
descriptions.32: Gana Aceleradores gratuitos en base a Diamantes sin gastar.
descriptions.33: Gana un Multiplicador gratuito por cada Potenciador de Aceleración que tengas.
descriptions.34: Gana un 3% más de Multiplicadores Gratuitos.
descriptions.35: Gana un 2% más de Multiplicadores Gratuitos.
descriptions.36: Multiplica la producción de Cristales por Diamantes, máximo de 1e5000x.
descriptions.37: Multiplica la producción de Fragmentos de Mythos por el logaritmo cuadrado de Diamantes.
descriptions.38: ¡Gana +20% más de Ofrendas gracias a Boosters de Servidor de Discord!
descriptions.39: ¡Gana +60% más de Velocidad de Hormigas gracias a Boosters de Servidor de Discord!
descriptions.40: ¡Gana +25% más de recompensas de Sacrificio gracias a Boosters de Servidor de Discord!
descriptions.41: Multiplica la producción basándose en Mythos sin gastar.
descriptions.42: Multiplica la producción de Fragmentos de Mythos basado en Diamantes sin gastar.
descriptions.43: Multiplica la producción de monedas por 1,01 por Trascensión (Max: 1e30x).
descriptions.44: Multiplica los Mythos ganados al Trascender por 1,01 por Trascensión (Max: 1e6x).
descriptions.45: Gana Aceleradores gratuitos basado en Fragmentos de Mythos.
descriptions.46: Los Potenciadores de Aceleración son 5% más fuertes y no resetean mejoras de Prestigio.
descriptions.47: Multiplica la producción de Fragmentos de Mythos basados en tus Puntos de Logro.
descriptions.48: Multiplica la producción basado en Aceleradores y Multiplicadores poseídos.
descriptions.49: Gana Multiplicadores gratis basados en Mythos sin gastar.

descriptions.57: La producción de Inversiones se multiplica por 1e+7500.
descriptions.58: La producción de Impresoras se multiplica por 1e+15000.
descriptions.59: La producción de Casas de Moneda se multiplica por 1e+25000.
descriptions.60: La producción de Laboratorios de Alquimia se multiplica por 1e+35000.
descriptions.61: Welcome to Reincarnation! +7 Salvage to get you started.
descriptions.62: Gain +0.02 Base Offerings per Challenge Completion! (Max: +12)
descriptions.63: La producción de Cristales se multiplica en base a partículas a la sexta potencia [Hasta 1e6000x].
descriptions.64: La Producción de Fragmentos de Mythos se multiplica por tus partículas al cuadrado.
descriptions.65: ¡Multiplica por 5 x la ganancia de las partículas por Reencarnación!
descriptions.66: Add +2 to the Rune Coefficient of the first five Runes. Reduce how many offerings you need to level up your Runes!
descriptions.67: ¡Ganancia de Átomos incrementada un 3% por productor de Partículas comprado!
descriptions.68: Obtén un Multiplicador gratuito por cada aumento de 1e1000 en impuestos.
descriptions.69: Obtén más Obtainium basado en tu ganancia de partículas. [¡Funciona con automatización a un ratio reducido!]
descriptions.70: El tiempo parece ir +0,333*log10(MAX Obtainium +1)% más rápido al comprar esto.
descriptions.71: Las Runas ganarán (Nivel de Runa/25) EXP adicional por Ofrenda usada.
descriptions.72: ¡La ganancia de Obtainium de Reencarnación se multiplica (1 + 2C) donde C son los #Desafíos de Reencarnación finalizados, hasta 50x!
descriptions.73: Gana +100% Potenciadores de Aceleradores gratuitos y +10 niveles gratuitos de Mejora de Cristal, pero solo en los Desafíos de Reencarnación.

descriptions.75: La ganancia de Ofrendas se incrementa en base al mayor número de Obtainium sin gastar. [Máx: 30.000.000 Obtainium]

descriptions.77: This is Synergism, right? Let's make each purchased Ant multiply Ant Speed by 1.004.
descriptions.78: Gain an Ant speed multiplier! x(1 + 0.005 * (log10(MAX Offerings + 1))^2) Ant Speed, to be precise.

campaigns.campaignInfo: Play through <> with various modifiers to make it spicier, but also more cubical! Each Campaign is a <> form of <>. <>

first.name: The first Campaign
first.description: Welcome to Campaigns! These are Ascensions with corruption modifiers, which make the Ascension harder, but give better rewards!

second.name: The second Campaign
second.description: As you can see, there are multiple different forms of corruption. You'll see more as you progress through Campaign!

third.name: Campaign the Third
third.description: Kinda stacking a bit more. Notice the Ascension Score Multiplier? It goes up based on how many corruptions you have.

fourth.name: Campaign IV
fourth.description: Corruptions also have levels to them. Harder Campaigns will have higher corruption levels... and a higher Ascension Score multiplier!

fifth.name: The fifth least Campaign
fifth.description: You can earn tokens by completing Campaigns! Tokens automatically reward bonuses, based on how many you have earned.

sixth.name: The sweet sixth Campaign
sixth.description: The difficulty Score of an Ascension is based on your corruption levels, based on 400 + 16 * (sum of squared corruption levels).

seventh.name: I think you understand this Corruption set by now
seventh.description: If you can beat this, then Challenge 12 should be doable!

eighth.name: Woah, a new Corruption!
eighth.description: This Campaign has a new corruption, which eats at your Diamond production.

ninth.name: More Viscosity!
ninth.description: We wanted to make things more viscous.

tenth.name: Extinction Event I
tenth.description: This Campaign has a new corruption, which eats at your Ants. Oh the Ant-ity!

eleventh.name: Campaign XI
eleventh.description: Harder setup. Oh, and these corruptions can go to level 7 if they want.

twelfth.name: Campaign XII
twelfth.description: We can combine the new corruptions in a way that Synergistically make it more difficult to beat, but a lot more rewarding.

thirteenth.name: Campaign XIII
thirteenth.description: As you may notice, having multiple corruptions greatly boosts your score, more so than just leveling corruptions higher.

fourteenth.name: Campaign XIV
fourteenth.description: You can sometimes increase a Corruption without hurting your run, if it does not strongly impact your challenge completions.

fifteenth.name: Campaign XV
fifteenth.description: The last of the Campaigns before Challenge 13. Good luck!

sixteenth.name: Campaign XVI
sixteenth.description: New Corruptions! Reduce your Obtainium gain, and reduce your Coin gain. Maybe it reminds you of an upcoming challenge?

seventeenth.name: Campaign XVII
seventeenth.description: Amping up the illiteracy a bit, you will gain even less Obtainium. It's probably less important than coins, right?

eighteenth.name: Campaign XVIII
eighteenth.description: Let's up the ante. Six Corruptions at once! And your Ascension Score Multiplier is very quickly increasing.

nineteenth.name: Campaign XIX
nineteenth.description: Even more illiteracy! Maybe you'll notice how hard it can be to earn Hypercubes.

twentieth.name: Campaign XX
twentieth.description: As long as you can handle having less Obtainium, leveling up the illiteracy corruption is worth it.

twentyFirst.name: Campaign XXI
twentyFirst.description: It is also sometimes worth trading one penalty for another. In this case, you get more Obtainium, but almost no Diamonds. Higher multiplier for Corruption Levels!

twentySecond.name: Campaign XXII
twentySecond.description: Fewer Offerings, and less Obtainium. Perhaps your ants can compensate for lost power?

twentyThird.name: Campaign XXIII
twentyThird.description: When adjusting your setup, it helps to slowly change your loadout, trying to increase your score multiplier without sacrificing too many Challenge 10 runs.

twentyFourth.name: Campaign XXIV
twentyFourth.description: A challenging but useful loadout for pre-challenge 14. Can you beat it and get Hypercubes?

twentyFifth.name: Campaign XXV
twentyFifth.description: The last Campaign before Challenge 14! After this, you can change your corruptions at will, but stay tuned for more useful corruption builds.

twentySixth.name: Campaign XXVI
twentySixth.description: Uh oh, it's time for Dilation! It does not make Ascensions slower, unless you need fast timers on pre-Ascension resets.

twentySeventh.name: Campaign XXVII
twentySeventh.description: The last new Corruption, this makes your Challenge requirements directly larger. Trading completions for a direct score multiplier!

twentyEighth.name: Campaign XXVIII
twentyEighth.description: You may start to see how the Corruptions are a little difficult to master. These setups are recommended by Synergists of past, for Synergists of today.

twentyNinth.name: Campaign XXIX
twentyNinth.description: This is probably harder than Campaign 30, but has a higher score multiplier. This is meant to be a challenge, so it is out-of-meta.

thirtieth.name: Campaign 30
thirtieth.description: You may want to consider this as you grind up for the Ultimate Moon Cube Upgrade.

thirtyFirst.name: Campaign XXXI
thirtyFirst.description: We increase Hyperchallenge as a Corruption when we can clear enough challenges to justify the increase.

thirtySecond.name: Campaign XXXII
thirtySecond.description: When you finish the final Research, you should have enough power to take this on profitably. Maybe you will also get Platonic Cubes?

thirtyThird.name: Campaign XXXIII
thirtyThird.description: The Global Speed can be leveraged against having less Offerings or Obtainiums, like in this example.

thirtyFourth.name: Campaign XXXIV
thirtyFourth.description: Are you starting to go for the Thousand Moons Cube Upgrade?

thirtyFifth.name: Campaign XXXV
thirtyFifth.description: You may REALLY want to upgrade that Cube Upgrade!

thirtySixth.name: Campaign XXXVI
thirtySixth.description: As you upgrade the Thousand Moons, you can take on much more difficult Corruption Builds!

thirtySeventh.name: Campaign XXXVII
thirtySeventh.description: You should also bump up your Tributes, if you have not.

thirtyEighth.name: Campaign XXXVIII
thirtyEighth.description: How is that Thousand Moons Cube Upgrade coming along?

fortieth.name: Campaign XL
fortieth.description: Before proceeding in this Campaign, you have to have the Thousand Moons upgrade maxxed. Congratulations!

fortySecond.name: Campaign XLII
fortySecond.description: Congratulations on getting Corruptions Level 12! As you see from the Score Multiplier, it's a huge difference.

fortyThird.name: Campaign XLIII
fortyThird.description: The sixth Platonic upgrade is very powerful, but expensive. Hopefully this build can help you reach it faster.

fortyFourth.name: Campaign XLIV
fortyFourth.description: As you buy the Platonic upgrades, your ability to do Corruptions will greatly increase as a result of their effect reductions.

fortyFifth.name: Campaign XLV
fortyFifth.description: Corruptions Level 13! Woah! You are getting close to the end of the Campaigns.

fortySixth.name: Campaign XLVI
fortySixth.description: As we round out, you should be able to clear Ascensions with mostly maxxed Corruptions. Viscosity is strong and thus lower level.

fortySeventh.name: Campaign XLVII
fortySeventh.description: While slightly easier, you may still get more Ascension rewards due to having more Challenge completions.

fortyEighth.name: Campaign XLVIII
fortyEighth.description: This is the final serious setup. Good job on making it this far, and best of luck on the last two.

fortyNinth.name: Campaign XLIX - The Challenge 15 Build
fortyNinth.description: It's like Challenge 15, but it's not.

fiftieth.name: Campaign L - The Final Campaign
fiftieth.description: The final campaign. Don't count on beating it on your first try. Maybe you need to go beyond Ascensions?

corruptionTexts.viscosity: Free Accel. and Multipliers Exponent ^{{ effect }}

importCorruptionsPrompt.import:
Enter a Corruption Loadout to import for next Ascension. You can have it in the following format: 
 {"corr1Name": num1, "corr2Name": num2, ...} 
 It can also be in the following text format: num1/num2/.../num8 [Legacy] 
 Possible corrNames: "viscosity", "drought", "deflation", "extinction", "illiteracy", "recession", "dilation". "hyperchallenge"

footnotes.buildings: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the corresponding tier starting from the top. Press [A] to buy Accelerator, [M] to buy Multiplier, or [B] to buy Accelerator Boost.
footnotes.buildings2: Press [Left arrow] or [Right arrow] on your keyboard to switch tabs. Enjoy!
footnotes.crystals: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer. Press [6], [7], [8], [9] or [0] to buy the corresponding Crystal upgrade starting on the left.
footnotes.mythos: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.particle: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] on your keyboard to buy the respective tiered producer.
footnotes.upgrade: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], or [6] on your keyboard to use resources for each upgrades.

achievements.purple: Fondo violeta: No logrado, da un bonus multiplicador.
achievements.red: Fondo rojo: No logrado, desbloquea contenido/elementos.
achievements.none: Sin fondo: No logrado, nada especial.

footnotes.runes: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], or [7] on your keyboard to use offerings for each rune, starting with Speed Rune on the left; must have rune unlocked to use hotkey!

challenges.hotkey: Press [1], [2]... up to [0] on your keyboard to enter challenges 1 to 10. Press [E] to exit your Transcension or Reincarnation challenge if stuck!
challenges.finishTranscension: Si eres incapaz de terminar un desafío de Trascensión, presiona la tecla de atajo que aparece arriba o haz clic en el botón rojo "C" del Desafío en los botones de reseteo en la parte superior.
challenges.leaveReincarnation: ¡Para irse de un desafío de Reencarnación, pulsa el "C" gris en su lugar!

footnotes.research: Welcome to the future! Obtainium is gained through <<var(--green-text-color);|Reincarnations>>. I'd recommend studying the <<limegreen;|green-bordered>> Researches first. The <<var(--crimson-text-color);|red-bordered>> Researches are never reset whereas the <<white;|white-bordered>> Researches will reset upon the next reset tier!
footnotes.shop: ¡Deslízate por cada porción de la tienda para ver lo que hace cada mejora!

coinFlavorTexts.1: You have nothing but 100 coins. You can hire a worker, conveniently for exactly 100 coins!
coinFlavorTexts.2: Your workers sure are working hard. Let's buy some investments with our coins!
coinFlavorTexts.3: A million coins! Something tells you that being a millionaire here isn't all that impressive.
coinFlavorTexts.4: You're beyond rich, you're loaded! However, it does not feel... <<cyan | prestigious>> enough.
coinFlavorTexts.5: Even with your prestige, it does not do your 1 googol coins justice. You must <<orchid | transcend>> your idea of wealth.
coinFlavorTexts.6: 1e500 coins! Weren't you dirt poor just a couple hours ago?
coinFlavorTexts.7: 1e2500 coins! Even the amount of digits in your wealth is becoming noteworthy to you or I. Might I need to <<limegreen | reincarnate>> to regain consciousness?
coinFlavorTexts.8: I'm starting to believe that no amount of coins are enough. <<limegreen | Reincarnation>> only strengthens your penchant for wealth accumulation.
coinFlavorTexts.9: Your wealth now has 100,000 digits. Have you even considered how long it would take to write it out? You should ask <>.
coinFlavorTexts.10: Remember when you had just a million coins? Pepperidge farm remembers. <<grey | Your Grandma>> remembers...
coinFlavorTexts.11: The three digits at the front of your total coins are called a <<orange | mantissa>>. Do they even matter in your case?
coinFlavorTexts.12: Your wealth is equal to the number of atoms in the universe, raised to the power of <<gold | 1,250,000>>...
coinFlavorTexts.13: You see the ants from down here. However, do you see the ants from <<orange | up there>>?
coinFlavorTexts.14: If you had a dollar for every digit in your wealth, you would be the richest person on this thing one would call <<lightblue|"Earth">>...
coinFlavorTexts.15: 10^1,000,000,000,000,000 Coins! If the exponent were multiplied by 9, in some alternative <<grey | Realities>> you would overflow the universe with coins.
coinFlavorTexts.16: An exponent so large, many wouldn't know it by name.
coinFlavorTexts.17: Have you ever questioned why the <<gray | Tax Man>> divides your coins? The ultimate creator of this reality, which you believe to be a <<cyan | Platonic>> (ideal) being, instructed as much.
coinFlavorTexts.18: Octillions of digits in your wealth! What if there were other <<green | Octagonal>> objects in this reality? That would be silly.
coinFlavorTexts.19: I still remember ye olde days, when workers were <<gold | 100 Coins>>, do you?
coinFlavorTexts.20: I think you are long past the point where the <<gray | Tax Man>> is the only thing holding you back. Right?
coinFlavorTexts.21: Sometimes you wonder if the Ant God is better off just feeding off your Coins. You surely have enough.
coinFlavorTexts.22: Ant God, Derpsmith, the Gold Guy, <<cyan | Platonic>>... who are all of these entities anyway?
coinFlavorTexts.24: They should write stories about your wealth. It only suffices that an <<grey | Ultimate Pen>> will do.
coinFlavorTexts.25: No one will know my name, but the bards' songs will remain.
coinFlavorTexts.26: That's a lot of coins lol

buyLevel.buyPrompt: ¿Cuántos Octeractos te gustaría gastar? Tienes {{{n}} OCT. ¡Escribe -1 para usar max!
buyLevel.cannotAfford: No puedes permitirte esta mejora. ¡Lo siento!

octeractStarter.name: Octeractos para Dummies
octeractStarter.description: Hello... I Am Derpsmith... The Ancestor Of Ant God... I Did Not Expect You To Get Here. Here Is 40% More Quarks, 20% More Octeracts, And 100,000x Ant Speed...
octeractStarter.effect: {{n}} has presentado sus respetos a Derpsmith.

octeractGain.name: Cogénesis de Octeractos
octeractGain.description: Are you despising how slow these damn things are? Gain 1% more of them per level! Simple.

octeractGain2.name: Trigénesis de Octeractos
octeractGain2.description: Resulta que tienes seis dimensiones adicionales para modificar tu Cogénesis. ¡+1% más Octs por nivel!

octeractQuarkGain.name: Octeracto de Quarks
octeractQuarkGain.description: Una forma alternativa del hepteracto, te da un 1.1% Bonus de Quarks por nivel sin Retornos Disminuidos.

octeractQuarkGain2.name: Sinergia Primaria Octo-Hepteracto
octeractQuarkGain2.description: For every 111 levels of Quark Octeract, you gain 0.01% more Quarks per digit in your Quark Hepteract count per level!

octeractCorruption.name: Corrupciones EXTRA GORDITAS
octeractCorruption.description: Adds one level to the cap on Corruptions. Derpsmith approves.
octeractCorruption.effect: El límite de nivel de corrupción aumenta en {{n}}

octeractGQCostReduce.name: ¡Costes de Quarks Dorados EXTRA DEBILUCHOS!
octeractGQCostReduce.description: Reduce el coste de Quarks Dorados de la tienda un 1% por nivel.

octeractExportQuarks.name: Velocidad de Descarga Mejorada
octeractExportQuarks.description: Thanks to ethernet technology, Export Quarks are increased by 40% per level! Only normal ones.

octeractImprovedDaily.name: Código Diario GORDO
octeractImprovedDaily.description: Derpsmith hacks into the source code, and adds +1 free Golden Quark upgrade per day from Daily.
octeractImprovedDaily.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily2.name: Código Diario GORDISIMO
octeractImprovedDaily2.description: Derpsmith implemented hyperspeed multiplication. +1% more free Golden Quark upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily2.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}}% more free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedDaily3.name: Código Diario GORDIMAXIMO
octeractImprovedDaily3.description: It will never satisfy Derpsmith. +1 +0.5% more free Golden Quark upgrades per day from Daily!
octeractImprovedDaily3.effect: Code 'daily' gives +{{n}} more free Golden Quark upgrades per use.

octeractImprovedQuarkHept.name: Deseo Hepteractos de Quarks aún mejores.
octeractImprovedQuarkHept.description: The godmother is absent, but Derpsmith is here! +0.02 exponent to your Quark Hepteract per level.

octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.name: The Forbidden Clock of Time
octeractImprovedGlobalSpeed.description: Se cree encerrado dentro de cámaras de tiempo hiperbolicas. ¡+1% Velocidad Global por nivel por singularidad!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.name: Fotoquinesis Abstracta
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed.description: ¡Gana +0,05% Velocidad de Ascensión por nivel por singularidad!

octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.name: Exoquinesis Abstracta
octeractImprovedAscensionSpeed2.description: ¡Gana +0,02% Velocidad de Ascensión por nivel por singularidad!

octeractImprovedFree.name: ¡Wow! Quiero que las mejoras gratuitas sean mejores.
octeractImprovedFree.description: Makes the effective level of Golden Quark upgrades equal to <<gold | (Paid Levels * Free Levels)^0.6>> instead of <<gold | (Paid Levels + Free Levels)>>. But, if the second formula is greater then you still get that value!
octeractImprovedFree.effect: Golden Quark upgrade free levels are {{n}} being powered!

octeractImprovedFree2.name: ¡Wow! Las mejoras gratuitas aún apestan.
octeractImprovedFree2.description: Who said beggars can't be choosers? Increase the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.05.

octeractImprovedFree3.name: ¡Wow! ¡Haz las mejoras gratitas buenas de una vez, platonic!
octeractImprovedFree3.description: Increase the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.05

octeractImprovedFree4.name: Cupón de los Derpsmiths Sin Blanca Final
octeractImprovedFree4.description: Each level increases the exponent of the first upgrade in this set by 0.001, with the first level adding another 0.01.

octeractBonusTokens1.name: Tokens of Derpsmith
octeractBonusTokens1.description: Derpsmith gives you a token of his appreciation. +1 Tokens per level when your challenge completions are maxxed!

octeractBonusTokens2.name: Tokens of Derpsmith II
octeractBonusTokens2.description: Under some weird trade agreement, you get +1% Tokens from Campaigns per level. Pray that the trade is not further altered.

octeractBonusTokens3.name: Tokens of Derpsmith III
octeractBonusTokens3.description: Even grazing the doorstep, Derpsmith acknowledges your bravery. +1 Token per level for each campaign with at least 1 completion.
octeractBonusTokens3.effect: Token gain +{{n}} for Campaigns with at least 1 completion.

octeractBonusTokens4.name: Tokens of Derpsmith IV
octeractBonusTokens4.description: Derpsmith is impressed by your dedication. +2 Tokens at the start of your Singularity per level.
octeractBonusTokens4.effect: Token gain +{{n}} at the start of your Singularity..

octeractSingUpgradeCap.name: Sobreescribiendo Punteros
octeractSingUpgradeCap.description: Derpsmith encountered a SegFault after reassigning null... +1 to level cap on certain Golden Quark Upgrades per level!
octeractSingUpgradeCap.effect: Some Golden Quark Upgrades have +{{n}} max level!

octeractAscensions.name: Garantía Anulada
octeractAscensions.description: Gana +1% de Cuenta de Ascensión por nivel, con un extra 2% por cada 10 niveles.
octeractAscensions.effect: El contador de Ascensión sube un {{n}}% más rápido.

octeractAscensions2.name: Honorarios Tardíos Ocultos
octeractAscensions2.description: Gana +1% de Cuenta de Ascensión por nivel, con un extra 2% por cada 10 niveles. Pero... esto escala mucho más rápido. Deben ser esas comisiones tardías ocultas.
octeractAscensions2.effect: El contador de Ascensión sube un {{n}}% más rápido.

octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.name: Acumulador Digital de Octeractos
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.description: ¡La ganancia Octeractos es 1% más rápida por cada dígito en su cuenta de Ascensiones!
octeractAscensionsOcteractGain.effect: Octeract Gain per order of magnitude Ascension count increase +{{n}}%

octeractFastForward.name: Descombobulador Singular de Derpsmith
octeractFastForward.description: Each level gives +2.5% more Golden Quarks (additive), and lets you 'look ahead' another Singularity!
octeractFastForward.effect: Singularities give {{n100}}% more GQ, 'look ahead' limit +{{n}}

octeractAutoPotionSpeed.name: Píldoras de Sed Aumentada
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.description: ¡Puedes comprar píldoras de sed para consumir pociones automáticamente más rápido! 4% más rápido por nivel para ser preciso.
octeractAutoPotionSpeed.effect: ¡El beneficio de Singularidad de Auto-Poción funciona {{n}}% más rápido que antes!

octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.name: Infusión de Vitamina O
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.description: ¡Gracias a la generosidad de tu Derpsmith, las pociones son un 2% más potentes por nivel!
octeractAutoPotionEfficiency.effect: Las pociones dan un {{n}}% más de Ofrendas y Obtainium.

octeractOneMindImprover.name: Transcripción Infinita de Una Mente
octeractOneMindImprover.description: Preguntas qué hace esta mejora, pero Derpsmith simplemente asiente. ¿Qué estará ocultándote?
octeractOneMindImprover.effect: Una Mente convierte la Velocidad de Ascensión en Ganancia de Octeracto al poder de {{n}}.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.name: Florentine Cranberries
octeractAmbrosiaLuck2.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +2 Ambrosia Luck, which can increase Ambrosia drop amounts when Blueberries generate Ambrosia.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.name: Berries of a Four Leaf Clover
octeractAmbrosiaLuck3.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +3 Ambrosia Luck per level.

octeractAmbrosiaLuck.name: Bayas de un Trébol de Ocho Hojas
octeractAmbrosiaLuck.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +4 Ambrosial Luck per level, and it is infinitely levelable!

octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.name: Bayas de un Trébol de Diez Hojas
octeractAmbrosiaLuck4.description: Totally not a reskin of the blueberry! Adds +5 Ambrosial Luck. And it's mega expensive somehow.

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.name: Reloj de Arena de Minuta
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.description: A somewhat primitive hourglass which somehow grants +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level...
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration2.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.name: Reloj de Arena de Miopatía
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.description: An hourglass which is still primitive, though somehow less so. +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration3.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.name: Reloj de Arena de Infinidad
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.description: Don't get it twisted, this hourglass is really primitive. But it gives +1% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level and is infinitely levelable!
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.name: Reloj de Arena de Realidad
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.description: An hourglass which is nonprimitive and 'more timely'- whatever that means. +2% faster Ambrosia Bar Point creation per level.
octeractAmbrosiaGeneration4.effect: Ambrosia Bar Point creation is +{{n}}% faster!

octeractBlueberries.name: Berries that are Blue!
octeractBlueberries.description: Blueberries are a blue fruit. Enough said.

octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.name: Green Infinity Shop Voucher
octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.description: A Shop Voucher, printed on a green tablet. Each grants +1 effective level of the 'Infinity CO.' Quark Shop upgrades.
octeractInfiniteShopUpgrades.effect: You own {{n}} Green Infinity Shop Vouchers!

octeractTalismanLevelCap1.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman
octeractTalismanLevelCap1.description: You can't wear this Talisman, but it will give you an extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap1.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap2.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - UNCOMMON Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap2.description: By increasing the rarity of this unwearable Talisman, you gain an extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap2.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap3.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - EPIC Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap3.description: Gain another extra level to (most) Talisman level caps per level!
octeractTalismanLevelCap3.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

octeractTalismanLevelCap4.name: Talisman Level Cap Increaser Talisman - MYTHIC Rarity
octeractTalismanLevelCap4.description: I think you can guess what the <<crimson | ✎>> Signature of this Talisman would be...
octeractTalismanLevelCap4.effect: Talisman level cap is increased by {{n}}

runes.recycleChance: You have {{amount}} Salvage. The amount of Offerings needed to level up Runes, Blessings, and Spirits is divided by {{mult}}!
runes.recycleChanceDividedBy: You have {{amount}} Salvage. The amount of Offerings needed to level up Runes, Blessings, and Spirits is multiplied by {{div}}.
runes.hover: ¡Hey, pasa el cursor sobre un icono de runa para obtener detalles sobre lo que hace cada una y qué beneficios te están dando!
runes.thanksResearches: 🜇 The effect of the first five Runes is increased by {{percent}}%

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: An energy emanates from this stone. You feel compelled to inscribe power into it with your Offerings.
speed.lockedDescription: Erm. This should be unlocked. If you see this, please report it as a bug.
speed.values: +0.02% Accelerator Power, +0.25% Free Accelerators per level. Global Speed (affecting resource production, and most reset timers) is multiplied by up to 2!
speed.effect: Speed Rune Bonus: +{{val}}% Accelerator Power, +{{val2}} Free Accelerators, +{{val3}} Global Speed.

duplication.name: Duplication
duplication.description: "Its ability lies in the world inside of the mirror..." -some bizarre inscription
duplication.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Prestige 100 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
duplication.values: +0.2 Multiplier Power Boost (each gives +0.02 to Multiplier Power), +0.25% Free Multipliers per level. Tax growth is delayed more for each level (cap: 99.9%)!
duplication.effect: Duplication Rune Bonus: +{{val}} Multiplier Power Boosts, +{{val2}} Free Multipliers, -{{val3}}% Tax Growth.

prism.name: Prism
prism.description: Has all colors of the visible light spectrum. As well as a few you cannot yet fathom.
prism.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Transcend 1,000 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
prism.costDivisor: <<lightblue | Crystal Upgrade Costs /{{val}}>> (Divide by 10 every 10 Power)
prism.values: ~(1 + (Level/2)^2 * 2^(Level/2) / 256)x Crystal Production. Every 10 Rune Power, divide the cost of all Crystal Upgrades by 10.
prism.effect: Prism Rune Bonus: All Crystal Producer production multiplied by {{val}}x, The costs of all Crystal Upgrades is divided by {{val2}}.

thrift.name: Thrift
thrift.description: It seems with this Rune in tow, you keep making great deals on your purchases, and your Offerings are just a little more reusable.
thrift.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, Reincarnate 10,000 times. You even get an Achievement for it!
thrift.costDelay: <<lime | Building Cost Growth Delay +{{val}}%>> (+0.125% per Power, max +1.00e15% at 8e15 Power)
thrift.values: +0.125% building cost growth delay per level, more Salvage per level (log scaling), Tax Growth is delayed more for each level (cap: 99%)!
thrift.effect: Thrift Rune Bonus: Delay all producer cost increases by {{val}}%, Salvage: +{{val2}}. -{{val3}}% Tax Growth

superiorIntellect.name: Superior Intellect
superiorIntellect.description: Over a hundred times the number of brain cells the average human has, put into one rock. It's probably sentient.
superiorIntellect.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! Unlocking it might require some novel Research.
superiorIntellect.values: (1 + level/2000)x Offerings, (1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed
superiorIntellect.effect: S. Intellect Rune Bonus: Offerings x{{val}}, Obtainium x{{val2}}, Ant Speed x{{val3}}

infiniteAscent.name: Infinite Ascent
infiniteAscent.description: A staircase you can only climb facing backwards, how weird is that?
infiniteAscent.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! You may need some Quarks to unlock this one. Or, head to the <<gold | PseudoCoins>> tab to unlock it instantly!
infiniteAscent.salvage: BONUS! <> (+{{val2}} per Power. see Infinite Recycling)
infiniteAscent.values: +0.2% Quarks, +1% all Cube types per level! Start with +10% Quarks.
infiniteAscent.effect: IA Rune Bonus: Quark Gain +{{val}}, Ascensions give +{{val2}} more Cubes.

antiquities.name: Antiquities of Ant God
antiquities.description: The piece of eight, long thought lost, no longer. It went there and back again.
antiquities.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, you might need to buy something that should be left unbought.
antiquities.singularityUnlock: Something singular that's unlocked at Level 1: {{symbol}}
antiquities.addCode: <<lightgray | 'Add' Code Refresh Interval {{val}}>> (-20% at 1 Power, up to -50%)
antiquities.values: Level 1 unlocks something special! Each level gives 10x Offerings, 10x <> Obtainium and makes code 'Add' regenerate faster.
antiquities.effect: Offerings x{{val}}, <<cyan | Immaculate>> Obtainium x{{val2}}, 'Add' code regeneration interval is {{val3}}% as long.

horseShoe.name: The Horse's Shoe
horseShoe.description: I never realized the world was so easily won, just by realizing you got someone to say you won't be lonely anymore.
horseShoe.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! To unlock it, you might need to tussle with the <<lightgray|Taxman>> himself.
horseShoe.values: Each level gives you +1 Ambrosia Luck, +0.2 Red Luck. You also reduce the Luck Conversion Ratio between the two by up to 0.5, depending on level (-0.5 * level / (level + 50))
horseShoe.effect: Horseshoe Rune Bonus: +{{val}} Ambrosia Luck, +{{val2}} Red Luck, {{val3}} Luck Conversion Ratio.

finiteDescent.name: Finite Descent
finiteDescent.description: That shopkeep told me it was an Ascent. That liar!
finiteDescent.lockedDescription: This rune is locked! Honestly, I have no idea how you unlock this.
finiteDescent.infiniteAscentLevels: <<lightgoldenrodyellow | +{{val}} Free Infinite Ascent levels>> (+1 every 2 Power)
finiteDescent.values: Gain up to 2x more Ascension Score for your current Ascension, increase your free Corruption levels up to 0.15, and tack on +1 free Infinite Ascent level every two levels. Shweet!
finiteDescent.effect: This Ascension, gain +{{val}} Ascension Score, {{val2}} free Corruption levels, and +{{val3}} Infinite Ascent levels.

levelup.1: +(Nivel/4)^1,25 Acelerador, +0,25% Aceleradores por nivel. ¡+1 Potenciador de Acelerador cada 20 niveles!
levelup.2: +(Nivel/10) Multiplicadores cada 10º nivel, ¡+0,25% Multiplicadores por nivel. ¡El crecimiento de impuestos se retrasa más cada nivel!
levelup.3: ~(1 + (Nivel/2)^2 * 2^(Nivel/2) / 256)x Producción de Cristal. +1 Nivel gratis por cada mejora de Cristal por 16 niveles!
levelup.4: +0,125% retraso en crecimiento de coste de construcción por nivel, +0,0625% posibilidad de reciclaje de Ofrenda por nivel [MAX: 25%], 2^((1000 - Nivel)/1100) Multiplicador de crecimiento de impuestos TRAS nivel 400
levelup.5: ~(1 + level/200)x Obtainium, (1 + Level^2/2500)x Ant Hatch Speed, (1 + level/2000)x Offerings
levelup.6: +0,2% Quarks, ¡+1% todos los tipos de Cubos por nivel! Empieza con +10% Quarks.
levelup.7: Me pregunto qué pasará si le alimentas {{exp}} EXP de Runa.

power.1: Bonus de Runa de Velocidad: +{{bonus}} Aceleradores, +{{percent}}% Aceleradores, +{{boost}} Potenciadores de Acelerador.
power.2: Bonus de Runa de Duplicación: +{{mult1}} Multiplicadores, +{{mult2}}% Multiplicadores, -{{tax}}% Crecimiento de Impuestos.
power.3: Bonificación de Runa Prismática: Toda la producción del Productor de Cristal multiplicada por {{mult}}, gana +{{gain}}' niveles de cristal gratuitos.
power.4: Bonus de Runa de Ahorro: Retrasa el incremento de coste de productores un {{delay}}%. Posibilidad de Reciclaje de Ofrendas: +{{chance}}%. -{{tax}}% Crecimiento de impuestos
power.5: S. Intellect Rune Bonus: Obtainium gain x{{gain}}. Ant Speed: x{{speed}}. Offerings x{{offerings}}
power.6: Bonificación de Runa AI: Ganancia Quarks +{{percent1}}%, las Ascensiones dan +{{percent2}}% más de todos los tipos de cubos.
power.7: No puedes comprender la verdadera forma del tesoro de Dios Hormiga.

enterChallenge.lowSingularity: Derpsmith te prohíbe entrar en este desafío. Se más singular primero.
enterChallenge.confirmation: Está a punto de entrar en {{name}}. Tu timer de Singularidad no reseteará pero volverás al comienzo de una Singularidad. ¿Continuarás?
enterChallenge.decline: Derpsmith asiente. Vuelve cuando estés preparado...
enterChallenge.acceptSuccess: Estás intentando {{name}} #{{tier}}! Has vuelto a la Singularidad {{singReq}}. ¡Compra Antigüedades para completar el desafío!
enterChallenge.acceptFailure: Derpsmith declara que ya estás en un desafío de Singularidad y te prohíbe destruir el tejido de tu Realidad.

exitChallenge.decline: Derpsmith trata de abrazarte, pero no tiene brazos.
exitChallenge.acceptSuccess: ¡Has completado el nivel {{tier}} de {{name}}! Se han actualizado las recompensas correspondientes al desafío.
exitChallenge.acceptFailure: Has sido transportado a tu Singularidad más alta. ¡Inténtalo de nuevo pronto! -Derpsmith

toString.canEnter: Se puede entrar desde la Singularidad mayor {{unlockSing}} [Tu más alta: {{highestSing}}]
toString.currentTierSingularity: El rango actual de este desafío tiene lugar en la Singularidad

noSingularityUpgrades.name: No Golden Quark Upgrades
noSingularityUpgrades.description:
Simply put, you have to beat the target Singularity without (most) Golden Quark Upgrades.
Octeracts, Perks and Quality of Life Singularity Upgrades are preserved.
noSingularityUpgrades.UniqueReward5: 30th - A new <<orchid|Quark Shop>> upgrade for NOT FREE!

oneChallengeCap.name: Límites de Un Desafío
oneChallengeCap.description: Supera la Singularidad, ¡Pero los primeros 14 desafíos tienen un límite de solo 1!
oneChallengeCap.UniqueReward4: 25th - +7 <<green|Reincarnation Challenge>> Cap! And +2 to Ascension Challenge caps.

noOcteracts.name: Sin Efectos de Octeracto
noOcteracts.description: Supera la singularidad, ¡Pero los octeractos y sus mejoras no hacen nada! La Singularidad Efectiva es también mucho más alta basada en el rango.
noOcteracts.ScalingReward1: +0.02 increase to <<var(--lightseagreen-text-color)|OCTERACT to CUBE>> bonus power (Base: 2.00) [effect halved after 10 completions]

limitedAscensions.name: Desafío de Veinte Ascensiones
limitedAscensions.description: Derpsmith ha embargado las Ascensiones. Sólo (20 - finalizaciones) están permitidas en esta Singularidad, antes de que las Ascensiones causen desventajas masivas! El Multiplicador de Cuenta de Ascensión es 1. Y Delta está deshabilitado. Ha.
limitedAscensions.ScalingReward1: <<orange|+0.1% Ascension Speed>> per Digit in your <<orange|Ascension Count!>>
limitedAscensions.UniqueReward1: 1st - Permanently double the cap of <<Pink|all Hepteracts>> for free!!! (This is really good!)

noAmbrosiaUpgrades.name: No Ambrosia Upgrades
noAmbrosiaUpgrades.description:
Gold Guy has lost his muster (and yes, that's his name!) and needs your help.
Clear the Singularity without any effects from Ambrosia or Ambrosia-Tier Upgrades!
noAmbrosiaUpgrades.UniqueReward3: 1st - Unlock <<red|Red Ambrosia>>! It's like Ambrosia, but <<red|red>>.

limitedTime.name: The Grand Singularity Speedrun!
limitedTime.description:
Derpsmith has a stopwatch and he's not afraid to use it! Beat the target Singularity in a limited time frame!
<>
After (600 - 20 * completion) seconds, your obt/off/cube production shatters (Divides by (10 + completions) every minute.
limitedTime.UniqueReward1: 1st - Your quarks no longer reset on Singularity!
limitedTime.UniqueReward3: 25th - A very expensive, not good, pretty bad <<orange|Quark Shop>> upgrade!

sadisticPrequel.name: SADISTIC EXALT III - The Prequel
sadisticPrequel.description: How much more will Platonic misuse the word 'Sadistic'? [No Sing Upgrade, Oct Upgrades OR Ambrosia Upgrades]
sadisticPrequel.ScalingReward2: +3% more <<orange|Free Upgrades>> from code 'Daily' per completion!

taxmanLastStand.name: The Taxman's Last Stand
taxmanLastStand.description: The Tax Man, wanting the Ultimate Pen, has some devious new tricks up his sleeve. Beat the target Singularity, except:
taxmanLastStand.salvageMod: <<lime|♽ Positive Salvage past 100 is vastly reduced (Divide by ln(1 + Positive Salvage))>>
taxmanLastStand.offeringMod: <<orange|☼ Each digit in your Offering Count divides your Obtainium gain by 2.5>>
taxmanLastStand.obtainiumMod: <<pink|☢ Each digit in your Obtainium Count divides your Offering gain by 2.5>>
taxmanLastStand.taxMod: ¢ Gain <<orange|4x>> the taxes when you've beaten Challenge 10, and <<red|5x>> more taxes when you've beaten Challenge 14
taxmanLastStand.capMod: <<white | ▼ You cannot gain more than (100x + 1) your current Obtainium or Offerings from any source>>
taxmanLastStand.tributeMod: <<gold | ε When you open Wow! Cubes, the amount of Tributes you get is divided by (ln^3(X + 1)), where X is the total number of Tributes plus Tributes you would otherwise gain>>
taxmanLastStand.omegaMod: <>
taxmanLastStand.ScalingReward1: +25 <<var(--red-text-color)|Talisman Level Caps>> for any Talisman that resets on Singularity
taxmanLastStand.UniqueReward3: 10th - Unlock <<burlywood | Something even Cooler... and Fashionable...>>

descriptions.1: +0.0090% Cubes per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.2: +0.018% Tesseracts per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.3: +0.054% Hypercubes per Corruption level per level!
descriptions.4: Gain +2.4% Platonic Cubes per level! It is that simple.
descriptions.5: C10 Exponent: 1.035 --> 1.0375, Constant tax exponent +0.10, 2x faster Constant production, 1.05x Quarks, +10 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +5 Ascension Challenge Cap, 2x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings, ^1.10 coin gain in C15, as well +1 Corruption Cap Level!
descriptions.6: Viscous's exponent is multiplied by 1+(level/30), capped at ^1.
descriptions.7: Global speed below 1x is raised to ^1-(level/30), ignoring Immaculate multipliers.
descriptions.8: The Hyperchallenge Cube's effect is divided by 1+(level*0.4), with a minimum of 1x.
descriptions.9: Gain 2.5x Immaculate Obtainium and multiply Defunded Education's exponent by 1+log10(Obtainium+1)/100, capped at 1e100 Obtainium.
descriptions.10: C10 Exponent: 1.0375 --> 1.04, Constant tax exponent +0.20, 10x faster Constant production, 1.10x Quarks, +10 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +5 Ascension Challenge Cap, 3.5x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings, 2x All Cubes, ^1.25 ant exponent in C15, +1 Corruption Cap Level again!
descriptions.11: If Crystal Mine Collapse is set to level 11 or higher, Reincarnations will also give Diamonds based on Particle gain!
descriptions.12: Gain an incorruptible x(1 + level/100) Ant multiplier per Challenge completion!
descriptions.13: 'Less Fruitful Harvests' reduces your <<green|Salvage>> by 50% less!
descriptions.14: Multiply Great Depression II's coin exponent by 1.55, but only in Challenge 15.
descriptions.15: You begin to find the start of the abyss. Coin Exponent +0.10 in Challenge 15, Challenge 15 Score +25%, Ascension Speed +0.2% per Corruption Level (Max: 20%), +1% to 3D-7D (Cube-Hepteracts) Cubes per C9 Completion (Multiplicative), 1.15x Quarks, 1e250x Tesseract Building Multiplier, 2x Ascension Count, +30 Reincarnation Challenge Cap, +20 Ascension Challenge Cap, 6x Immaculate Obtainium and Offerings! Talk about a deep dive.
descriptions.16: Increase powder conversion rate by 1% per level, gain +2% Ascension count per level and gain up to 2% more Ascension count per level based on powder, up to 100,000. This will also multiply Tesseract Building production by (Powder + 1)^(10 * level), uncapped.
descriptions.17: If this is bought, Viscous's score multiplier is raised to 3+(level*0.04) if its level is set to 10 or higher.
descriptions.18: Raise the base percentage of Constant Upgrade 1 by 0.1% and increase the base percentage cap of Constant Upgrade 2 by 0.3% per level!
descriptions.19: The Chronos Hepteract's diminishing return exponent is increased by level/750 (roughly 0.00133). (Base: 1/6)
descriptions.20: You know, maybe some things should be left unbought.

platonicUpgrades.20Bought: While I strongly recommended you not to buy this, you did it anyway. For that, you have unlocked the Antiquities of Ant God Rune.

main.transferredFromLZ: ¡Guardado transferido al nuevo formato con éxito!
main.allCorruptionsZero: Todas las Corrupciones se han puesto a Cero. Tendrá efecto en la próxima Ascensión.

main.ascendPrompt: Ascending will reset all buildings, rune EXP, talismans, most Researches, and the anthill feature for Cubes of Power. Continue?
main.reincarnatePrompt: Reencarnarse reseteará TODO pero ganarás Partículas extraordinariamente poderosas, y desbloquearás algunas características y mejoras muy sólidas. ¿Quieres Trascender? [Cambia este mensaje en ajustes.]
main.transcendPrompt: Trascender reseteará las mejoras de monedas, cristales y prestigio, sus productores Y diamantes. La primera Trascensión desbloquea nuevas características. ¿Quieres Trascender? [Cambia este mensaje en ajustes.]
main.prestigePrompt: Prestigiar reseteará las mejoras de monedas, sus productores Y cristales. El primer Prestigio desbloquea nuevas características. ¿Quieres Prestigiar? [Cambia este mensaje en ajustes.]
main.welcomeToSingularity: Bienvenido a la Singularidad #{{x}}. De nuevo en territorio familiar, pero algo es distinto.
main.singularityCancelled: Si decides cambiar de opinión, házmelo saber. -Dios Hormiga
main.singularityMessage1: Has llegado al final del juego, en Singularidad #{{x}}. Platonic y el Dios Hormiga están orgullosos de ti.
main.singularityMessage2: Puedes optar por sentarte en tus laureles y considerar el juego "ganado", o puedes hacer algo más interesante.
main.singularityMessage3: Eres demasiado poderoso para este universo. El multiverso de Synergism es verdaderamente interminable, pero ahí afuera hay universos paralelos a este aún más desafiantes.
main.singularityMessage4: Comienza de nuevo, entra en Singularidad #{{x}}. Tu siguiente universo es más difícil que este, pero desbloquea un permanente +10% de Bono de Quarks, +10% de Bono de Conteo de Ascensión, y gana {{y}} Quarks Dorados, que pueden comprar mejoras de final del juego [¡Aumentado un {{z}}% por bono de patreon!].
main.singularityMessage5: Sin embargo, ¡tus logros pasados desaparecerán! TODOS los Desafíos, Mejoras de Tienda Reembolsable, Mejoras de su pestaña, Runas y Todas las Mejoras de Cubos, Aperturas de Cubos, Hepteractos (Menos Hepteractos de Quarks), y Logros serán borrados.
main.singularityConfirm0: ¿Quieres empezar la singularidad #{{x}}? Tu próximo universo es más difícil pero ganarás {{y}} Quarks Dorados.
main.singularityConfirm1: Así que, ¿Qué dices? ¿Quieres entrar en la Singularidad?
main.singularityConfirm2: ¿Seguro que quieres entrar en la Singularidad?
main.singularityConfirm3: ¿Con TOTAL CERTEZA? ¡No podrás echarte atrás (sin un guardado anterior)! Confirma una última vez para sellar tu decisión.
main.noAntiquity: Hmph. Por favor, regresa con una Antiguedad. Gracias. -Dios Hormiga
main.insideSingularityChallenge: Derpsmith cree que estás en un Desafío de Singularidad. Puedes salir haciendo clic en el icono de desafío en la pestaña de Singularidad.
main.gameBeat: Bien. Parece que has llegado al ojo de la Singularidad. Estoy satisfecho. Esto también significa que no hay nada más que hacer aquí, al menos, no hasta que poderes superiores amplíen tu viaje.
main.exitAscensionChallenge: ¿Estás absolutamente seguro de abandonar el Desafío de Ascensión? ¡Necesitarás completar Desafío 10 de nuevo antes de intentar otro de nuevo!
